programme.title: Independence Day: Resurgence
programme.desc: As the Fourth of July nears, satellite engineer David Levinson investigates a 3,000-mile-wide mother ship that's approaching Earth. Fortunately, 20 years earlier, nations across the world started to use recovered extraterrestrial technology to develop an immense defence programme. When the alien invaders attack with unprecedented force, the U.S. president, teams of scientists and brave fighter pilots spring into action to save the planet from a seemingly invincible enemy.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Fallout
programme.desc: Ethan Hunt and the IMF team join forces with CIA assassin August Walker to prevent a disaster of epic proportions. Arms dealer John Lark and a group of terrorists known as the Apostles plan to use three plutonium cores for a simultaneous nuclear attack on the Vatican, Jerusalem and Mecca. When the weapons go missing, Ethan and his crew find themselves in a desperate race against time to prevent them from falling into the wrong hands.

programme.title: Scarface
programme.desc: After getting a green card in exchange for assassinating a Cuban government official, Tony Montana stakes a claim on the drug trade in Miami. Viciously murdering anyone who stands in his way, Tony eventually becomes the biggest drug lord in the state, controlling nearly all the cocaine that comes through Miami. But increased pressure from the police, wars with Colombian drug cartels and his own drug-fuelled paranoia serve to fuel the flames of his eventual downfall.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Presenting the latest products live on television that can be ordered directly. The product range extends from vacuum cleaners and bath towels to sports equipment.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Presenting the latest products live on television that can be ordered directly. The product range extends from vacuum cleaners and bath towels to sports equipment.

programme.title: Muppets From Space
programme.desc: Gonzo is convinced that he is of alien origin and struggles to communicate with his family in outer space. However, a government agent, determined to prove the existence of extraterrestrial life, captures Gonzo and it's up to Kermit and the gang to rescue him and reunite him with his long-lost family.

programme.title: The Seeker: The Dark Is Rising
programme.desc: A boy discovers he is `The Seeker', the last in a line of time-travelling peacekeepers who must fight against the evil Dark.

programme.title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
programme.desc: Bitten by a radioactive spider, teenager Miles Morales suddenly develops mysterious powers that transform him into Spider-Man. He must now use his newfound skills to battle the evil Kingpin, a hulking madman who can open portals to other universes.

programme.title: Tooth Fairy
programme.desc: Nicknamed the `Tooth Fairy' due to his penchant for knocking out other players' teeth, an arrogant hockey player's moniker becomes very apt when he steals a dollar that his girlfriend Carly's daughter has left for the real Tooth Fairy. Sprouting wings, Derek is summoned to meet the leader of the fairies, Lily, who labels him a `dream crusher' and orders him to serve as a tooth fairy to make up for his transgressions.

programme.title: Dog
programme.desc: With a dog named Lulu by his side, Army Ranger Briggs races down the Pacific Coast to make it to a soldier's funeral on time. Along the way, Briggs and Lulu drive each other completely crazy, break a handful of laws and narrowly evade death.

programme.title: Commando
programme.desc: The ex-leader of an elite military task force is pressed back into service when his daughter is kidnapped.

programme.title: American Woman
programme.desc: In a small blue-collar town in Pennsylvania, a 32-year-old woman's teenage daughter goes missing. Left to raise her infant grandson alone, she desperately seeks the answers behind her daughter's disappearance.

programme.title: You Are Not My Mother
programme.desc: In a North Dublin housing estate, Char's mother goes missing. When she returns, Char is determined to uncover the truth of her disappearance and unearth the dark secrets of her family.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Presenting the latest products live on television that can be ordered directly. The product range extends from vacuum cleaners and bath towels to sports equipment.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Presenting the latest products live on television that can be ordered directly. The product range extends from vacuum cleaners and bath towels to sports equipment.

programme.title: BSL Zone [NEW]
programme.desc: Teams consisting of a child and an adult compete for £1,000. Will we see a family feud as these teams face five challenging games? [SL].

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Presenting the latest products live on television that can be ordered directly. The product range extends from vacuum cleaners and bath towels to sports equipment.

programme.title: The Desert Fox
programme.desc: A portrait of Field Marshal Erwin Rommel, beginning with his initially successful exploits in the North African desert until his defeat by Montgomery. Returning to Berlin, he becomes involved with Colonel Von Stauffenberg's plot to assassinate Hitler, but when the dictator escapes the bomb and the conspirators are rounded up, Rommel, because of his high standing with the German public, is offered the choice of suicide.

programme.title: Anastasia
programme.desc: Oscar-winning movie set in 1920s Paris, in which an exiled group of White Russians claim to have discovered the daughter of the Tsar, presumed dead for ten years. In truth, she is an amnesiac refugee who has been selected to impersonate the heiress, but she must pass a severe test under the scrutiny of the Dowager Empress.

programme.title: Pool of London
programme.desc: When their ship docks, the crew disembark as usual to pick up their lives in postwar London. For one of them his petty smuggling turns more serious when he finds himself caught up with a robbery.

programme.title: Rio Grande
programme.desc: Lieutenant Colonel Kirby Yorke heads a cavalry post on the Texas side of the Rio Grande, defending settlers against Apaches launching raids from the Mexican side of the river. When Yorke's 16-year-old son, Jeff --- who he has not seen since he was a baby -- shows up at the post as one of the new recruits, he treats him more harshly than the others. Things are further complicated when Yorke's estranged wife, Kathleen, returns to take her son home.

programme.title: Flight of the Phoenix
programme.desc: A plane carrying a team of oil workers crash lands in the Gobi Desert. With supplies running low and bandits closing in, the survivors have little choice but to rebuild the wreck.

programme.title: Top Gun: Maverick
programme.desc: Pete Mitchell keeps pushing the envelope after years of service as one of the Navy's top aviators. He must soon confront the past while training a new squad of graduates for a dangerous mission that demands the ultimate sacrifice.

programme.title: Io capitano [NEW]
programme.desc: Seydou and Moussa, two 16-year-old Senegalese boys, decide to leave their homeland for Europe. Along the way, however, their dreams and hopes of a better life are quickly dashed by the dangers of the journey.

programme.title: The Guard
programme.desc: A vulgar Irish cop and a straight-laced American FBI agent uncover police corruption amongst the former's superiors while probing a drug-trafficking ring.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Presenting the latest products live on television that can be ordered directly. The product range extends from vacuum cleaners and bath towels to sports equipment.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Presenting the latest products live on television that can be ordered directly. The product range extends from vacuum cleaners and bath towels to sports equipment.

programme.title: A Lawless Street
programme.desc: A law enforcement cowboy, about to retire, aims to go out in a blaze by going on a crusade against local villains. However, his resolve weakens when an attractive musical star arrives in town.

programme.title: The Frogmen
programme.desc: Powerful and engrossing World War II tale centred on the exploits of frogmen in an underwater demolition team, headed by Lieutenant Commander John Lawrence, as they fight the Japanese.

programme.title: Henry VIII and His Six Wives
programme.desc: On his deathbed, King Henry VIII recalls how he wooed and wed his six wives - and disposed of five of them - in a bid to secure the succession to the throne with a male heir. Despite his many marriages and the crowded Court, Henry remains essentially lonely.

programme.title: The Violent Men
programme.desc: A soldier turned pacifist, recently returned from a bloody war, is forced into a confrontation with a bullying cattle baron. The disabled cattleman uses violence and scare tactics to push out smaller ranchers and farmers.

programme.title: Fatherhood
programme.desc: A father brings up his baby girl as a single dad after the unexpected death of his wife who died a day after their daughter's birth.

After crashing on an unknown planet, two survivors quickly discover they're actually stranded on Earth, 65 million years ago. With only one chance at a rescue, they must make their way across an unknown terrain riddled with prehistoric creatures.

programme.title: Glory
programme.desc: Based on the true story of a regiment of black soldiers in the American Civil War who are led by an inexperienced white officer in the fight against the Confederacy. The soldiers and their commander must overcome the racism of fellow Union officers and prove their valour on the battlefield.

programme.title: And Then We Danced
programme.desc: Merab has been training from a young age at the National Georgian Ensemble with his dance partner Mary. His world turns upside down when the carefree Irakli arrives and becomes both his strongest rival and desire.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Presenting the latest products live on television that can be ordered directly. The product range extends from vacuum cleaners and bath towels to sports equipment.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Presenting the latest products live on television that can be ordered directly. The product range extends from vacuum cleaners and bath towels to sports equipment.

programme.title: The Wrong Box
programme.desc: Two elderly brothers attempt to do away with each other in order to be the recipient of a massive family inheritance. Comic chaos and all kinds of shenanigans ensue as the two try anything, legal and otherwise, to guarantee becoming the sole surviving beneficiary.

programme.title: 13 rue Madeleine
programme.desc: Rough and tough OSS agent Bob Sharkey oversees a special mission to determine the location of the factory where the Nazis are manufacturing their notorious flying bombs. When a treacherous double agent murders one of the OSS recruits, Bob leaves London to personally lead the mission, centred in Paris. Based on actual OSS accounts and use of intelligence agency footage.

programme.title: Bridge of Spies: Interview Special
programme.desc: Director Steven Spielberg and stars Tom Hanks and Mark Rylance talk about making their Cold War espionage drama.

programme.title: Barnacle Bill
programme.desc: The comic tale of a failed sailor who sparks jealousies in a seaside community when he strikes it big in the end-of-the-pier entertainment trade. Captain Ambrose comes from a long line of seafarers, but can't be a sailor due to his seasickness, so he sets up store in a small British town, Sandcastle-on-Sea.

programme.title: The 300 Spartans
programme.desc: Historical epic spectacularly reenacting the heroic efforts of a handful of Spartan soldiers against the full might of the Persian army at Thermopylae in 480 BC.

programme.title: Daddy's Home
programme.desc: An insecure man competes for the affection of his stepchildren when their freewheeling father breezes back into town.

programme.title: Stillwater
programme.desc: An American oil-rig roughneck travels to Marseille, France, to visit his estranged daughter, in prison for a murder she claims she didn't commit. Confronted with language barriers, cultural differences and a complicated legal system, he soon builds a new life for himself as he makes it his personal mission to exonerate her.

programme.title: Not Okay
programme.desc: A misguided young woman who is desperate for friends and fame fakes a trip to Paris to update her social media presence. A terrifying incident takes place in the real world, which becomes a part of the imaginary trip and offers all she wants.

programme.title: Second Coming
programme.desc: A tight family unit navigating their way through family life as it breaks down in the aftermath of an unexplained pregnancy.

programme.title: The Body
programme.desc: A crucified body dated back to the first century A.D is uncovered at an ancient cave in Jerusalem. Trouble ensues as word spreads.

programme.title: The Beaver
programme.desc: Two-time Academy Award winner Jodie Foster directs and co-stars with two-time Academy Award winner Mel Gibson in The Beaver - an emotional story about a man on a journey to re-discover his family and re-start his life.

programme.title: A Dangerous Method
programme.desc: Drawn from true-life events, it takes a glimpse into the turbulent relationships between fledgling psychiatrist Carl Jung, his mentor Sigmund Freud and Sabina Spielrein, the troubled but beautiful young woman who comes between them.

programme.title: Brothers
programme.desc: Brothers tells the powerful story of two siblings, thirty-something Captain Sam Cahill and younger brother Tommy Cahill, who are polar opposites.

programme.title: The Believer
programme.desc: Ryan Gosling stars in the true story of an anti-Semitic skinhead who was revealed to be Jewish by a New York Times reporter.

programme.title: I Am Woman
programme.desc: The story of Helen Reddy, who in 1966 landed in NYC with her three-year-old daughter, a suitcase and $230 in her pocket. Within five years she was one of the biggest superstars of her time, and an icon of the 1970s feminist movement.

programme.title: Programming will resume shortly
programme.desc: We're catching up on our beauty sleep! Stay tuned for more priceless entertainment curated by Rakuten TV.

programme.title: Rex
programme.desc: Rex is based on the true-life story of young Marine Corporal Megan Leavey whose unique discipline and bond with her military combat dog saved many lives during their deployment in Iraq.

programme.title: The Body
programme.desc: A crucified body dated back to the first century A.D is uncovered at an ancient cave in Jerusalem. Trouble ensues as word spreads.

programme.title: Waiting for Anya
programme.desc: From the mind of world-renowned author Michael Morpurgo comes the cinematic adaptation of Waiting for Anya - a powerful and authentic true story of a young shepherd that had a key part to play in one of the world's most shocking moments in history.

programme.title: Hitler: The Last Ten Days
programme.desc: Berlin, 1945. In the Fuhrerbunker, the last hiding place of the man who unleashed a reign of terror across Europe, it is Adolf Hitler's 56th birthday.

programme.title: Louder Than Words
programme.desc: After the unexpected death of their daughter, a couple work to build a state of the art children's hospital where families are welcomed into the healing process.

programme.title: Sommersby
programme.desc: A man presumed dead shows up after six years, but he may be an imposter, and could choose to hang for murder rather than reveal the truth.

programme.title: Basmati Blues
programme.desc: Linda Watt (Brie Larson: Room, 21 Jump Street) is a sheltered but brilliant young scientist who is plucked out of her company's lab and sent to India by her CEO (Donald Sutherland: The Hunger Games) to sell "Rice 9," a genetically modified rice she's created.

programme.title: Love is a Piece of Cake
programme.desc: Jessie Dale is a third generation baker who loves her cake shop more than anything in the world. When developers threaten to buy her building and force her out, she must do all she can to save her bakery, all while juggling a blossoming romance with her client's brother.

programme.title: The Wedding Arrangements
programme.desc: When talented botanist Violet needs help preparing flower arrangements for a high-profile wedding, she calls upon Jack, a handsome nature photographer who has taken over responsibility for his grandfather's flower shed.

programme.title: Love & Other Drugs
programme.desc: A womanizing Viagra salesman with no sense of direction or responsibility falls in love with a free-spirited woman.

programme.title: Almost Love
programme.desc: Adam and Marklin's 5-year relationship has gone from a passionate flame to a simmer, forcing them to reconcile with each other's shortcomings while their friends endlessly search for love in New York City.

programme.title: Can You Keep A Secret?
programme.desc: On a return flight from a botched client meeting, Emma reveals all of her deepest secrets to a handsome stranger when her plane hits turbulence and she believes she is going to die. Emma thinks she will never see the guy again.

programme.title: Love, Rosie
programme.desc: Rosie and Alex have been best friends since age six. As they dream of travelling the world, they decide to leave their small British town for Boston together to attend university. But fate has other plans...

programme.title: Programming will resume shortly
programme.desc: We're catching up on our beauty sleep! Stay tuned for more priceless entertainment curated by Rakuten TV.

programme.title: Life or Something Like It
programme.desc: The perfect world of a beautiful Seattle television reporter is shattered by the prediction of her death in seven days.

programme.title: Mr. Morgan's Last Love
programme.desc: From the day Pauline (Clemence Poésy) lends him a helping hand on the bus, the stubborn and weary Matthew Morgan (Sir Michael Caine) stumbles back to happiness.

programme.title: Love & Where to Find It
programme.desc: Two local coffee shop business owners despise each other in real life, but fall in love while unknowingly sending each other messages via a dating app on their friends' behalf.

programme.title: Diana
programme.desc: Celebrated and adored by millions, she was the Queen of people's hearts, yet the bittersweet story of the last man to truly capture hers has never before. In a story that until now has remained untold, Diana introduces a time in the Princess's life that was important in shaping her final years...

programme.title: Love is a Piece of Cake
programme.desc: Jessie Dale is a third generation baker who loves her cake shop more than anything in the world. When developers threaten to buy her building and force her out, she must do all she can to save her bakery, all while juggling a blossoming romance with her client's brother.

programme.title: And So It Goes
programme.desc: A self-absorbed realtor enlists the help of his neighbor when he's suddenly left in charge of the granddaughter he never knew existed until his estranged son drops her off at his home.

programme.title: Runaway Jury
programme.desc: Set in New Orleans, this is the story of a mysterious man, Nick Easter. Nick gets himself not only on the jury of a landmark case against a gun manufacturer, but as the foreman, in an attempt to influence the other jury members to vote a certain way.

programme.title: The Internship
programme.desc: Billy (Vince Vaughn) and Nick (Owen Wilson) are salesmen whose careers have been torpedoed by the digital world. Trying to prove they are not obsolete, they defy the odds by talking their way into a coveted internship at Google, along with a battalion of brilliant college students.

programme.title: Nothing Like the Holidays
programme.desc: The far-flung members of the Rodriguez family converge at their parents' home to face what may be their last Christmas together in this heart-warming holiday comedy.

programme.title: Safe
programme.desc: When ex-Government agent Luke Wright exposes the Russian mafia for rigging an illegal fight, they seek revenge on his family and threaten to kill anyone close to him.

programme.title: Into The Blue 2: The Reef
programme.desc: Free-spirited scuba divers Sebastion and Dani run a modest diving company in Hawaii. The young couple is delighted when they're hired by mysterious jet-setters who are searching for sunken treasure and will pay big money for diving help.

programme.title: Final Kill
programme.desc: An aging protection specialist takes on one last job before retirement, protecting a couple who stole eight million dollars from a ruthless crime family.

programme.title: Transit
programme.desc: A gang of bank robbers hide their loot in the car of a family going camping. They chase down the family to kill them and get the loot back, but run into a fight.

programme.title: Programming will resume shortly
programme.desc: We're catching up on our beauty sleep! Stay tuned for more priceless entertainment curated by Rakuten TV.

programme.title: Salt and fire
programme.desc: A scientist blames the head of a large company for an ecological disaster in South America. But when a volcano begins to show signs of erupting, they must unite to avoid a disaster.

programme.title: Hudson
programme.desc: After his mother's death, Hudson, a reclusive but charming man, embarks on a journey with his distant cousin to scatter his mother's ashes in the Hudson Valley region of New York.

programme.title: Waiting for Anya
programme.desc: From the mind of world-renowned author Michael Morpurgo comes the cinematic adaptation of Waiting for Anya - a powerful and authentic true story of a young shepherd that had a key part to play in one of the world's most shocking moments in history.

programme.title: In Time
programme.desc: In a future where time is literally money and aging stops at 25, the only way to stay alive is to earn, steal, or inherit more time.

programme.title: Playing for Keeps
programme.desc: Playing For Keeps is a romantic comedy about a former soccer star who returns home to put his life back together. Looking for a way to rebuild his relationship with his son, he gets roped into coaching the boy's soccer team.

programme.title: Jumper
programme.desc: The epic adventures of a man who discovers that he possesses the exhilarating ability to instantly teleport anywhere in the world he can imagine.

programme.title: High Crimes
programme.desc: A woman's life becomes embroiled in a huge military cover-up when it's revealed her husband is not who he says he is.

programme.title: Girl Most Likely
programme.desc: Kristen Wiig stars as Imogene, once a promising young New York playwright whose promise has fizzled, thanks to a crisis of confidence. Heavily in denial about being dumped by her society boyfriend, Imogene uses her skill for drama to stage an elaborate fake suicide as an appeal for his sympathy.

programme.title: Monte Carlo
programme.desc: Grace (Selena Gomez) is an ordinary girl who becomes an accidental princess when a family summer trip to Paris turns into the fantasy of a lifetime. Living like royalty, Grace, along with her two best friends, discovers who she really is – by assuming another person's identity.

programme.title: A Good Old Fashioned Orgy
programme.desc: A Comedy About Old Friends In New Positions. A Good Old-Fashioned Orgy is about a close group of 30-somethings who spend every weekend of the summer throwing elaborate parties at the house belonging to group member Eric in the Hamptons.

programme.title: Yes, God, Yes
programme.desc: Growing up in the Midwest in the early OOs, sixteen-year-old Alice has always been a good Catholic. But when an innocent AOL chat turns racy, she discovers masturbation and is overwhelmed with guilt. Seeking redemption, she attends a mysterious religious retreat to try and suppress her urges...

programme.title: Killing Gunther
programme.desc: A dysfunctional team of young assassins set out to make a name for themselves by killing the most notorious hitman of all time, Gunther (Arnold Schwarzenegger).

programme.title: Are You Here
programme.desc: When Steve Dallas hears that his friend Ben Baker has lost his estranged father, the two return to Ben's childhood home to discover Ben has inherited the family fortune.

programme.title: Big Mommas: Like Father, Like Son
programme.desc: Big Momma is back — and this time he has big backup: his teenage stepson Trent (Brendan T. Jackson). Martin Lawrence returns as FBI agent Malcolm Turner and as Turner's deep-cover alter-ego Big Momma.

programme.title: Big Momma's House 2
programme.desc: Undercover Agent Malcolm Turner is back and this time he's out to expose the suspected designer of a deadly computer "worm" that would allow outside forces access to sophistical and critical government intelligence files.

programme.title: Who Gets the Dog?
programme.desc: A couple going through a divorce squabble over custody of their beloved dog.

programme.title: Barbershop
programme.desc: Calvin (Ice Cube) is a would-be entrepreneur with big plans...and running his family's barbershop isn't one of them. But when he impulsively sells the shop to a shady loan shark, he soon realizes just how important the neighborhood parlor is to him... and just how far he'll go to get it back!

programme.title: Moonstruck
programme.desc: In this classic romantic comedy, a Brooklyn widow (Cher) is ready to get married again. Only this time, she plans on doing it right, even if she has to say “yes” to a man she doesn't really love.

programme.title: Uptown Girls
programme.desc: Ray is a fussy nine-year-old girl whose last nanny just ran out. When Ray's way-too-busy mom hires Molly to be Ray's new nanny, it's the perfect setup for both girls to change their ways and discover that sometimes your best friend can come in the form that you least expect!

programme.title: Monte Carlo

programme.title: Dickinson's Real Deal
programme.desc: David Dickinson and the team are in Preston, with experts Alison Chapman, Tim Hogarth, Jan Keyne and Henry Nicholls assessing items brought in by members of the public.

programme.title: Tenable
programme.desc: A team of five quizzers attempt to top the Tenable tower and win a big cash prize by answering Top 10 list questions. Quiz show, hosted by Warwick Davis.

programme.title: Tipping Point
programme.desc: Ben Shephard hosts the quiz in which contestants answer questions to win turns on an arcade-style machine. Dropping tokens down a choice of four chutes, they hope to knock piles of them off a moving shelf - and the more they collect, the greater the prize fund. The player who has won the least amount is then eliminated, and the last one standing competes for a £10,000 jackpot.

programme.title: The Chase
programme.desc: Bradley Walsh presents as Katherine from East Lothian, Rachel from London, Tom from Oxford and Nick from West Yorkshire pit their wits against one of the ruthless experts in the hope of winning a potential prize pot worth thousands of pounds. They work as a team and play strategically to answer general knowledge questions against the clock and race down the game board to the exit without being caught.

programme.title: Emmerdale

programme.title: Love Your Garden
programme.desc: In Leicestershire, Alan and the team head to the town of Hinckley to surprise 96-year-old Second World War veteran Gordon with a stunning garden transformation. Alan sets about bringing a classic beautiful English country garden to this inaccessible space that includes raised beds in dry stone walls, a sociable seating area, a mini-orchard and an outdoor room.

programme.title: Murder: Buried Alive - True Crime Presents

programme.title: British Touring Car Championship Highlights
programme.desc: Nicki Shields presents action from the 25th, 26th and 27th races of the season, which came from Silverstone. Championship leader Tom Ingram extended his lead at the top of the standings last time out to 32 points, meaning that his nearest challenger and rival Ash Sutton must perform well if he is to challenge for what would be his fifth BTCC title. With commentary by David Addison and Tim Harvey.

programme.title: Frauds
programme.desc: When Bert is released from prison after 10 years, there is only one person she can turn to, her former partner-in-crime Sam. Bert rekindles their friendship and tries to convince Sam to help with her dying wish of one last job. Crime thriller, starring Suranne Jones and Jodie Whittaker.

programme.title: You Bet! on Tour

programme.desc: (2022) Festive rom-com with Vanessa Lengies. Data analyst Charlie is sent to a thriving toy shop to replicate its formula. Can manager Grant's secrets to success open her mind... and heart?

programme.title: Christmas Festival Of Ice
programme.desc: (2017) Heart-melting romance with Taylor Cole. A woman determined to keep an annual ice sculpture competition going enlists a charming local artist to help. But will she carve out some time for love?

programme.title: Her Magical Christmas
programme.desc: (2017) Seasonal drama with Jessica Lowndes. Heartbroken at Christmas, a woman loses her sparkle until magical ornaments sent by her mother help bring her hope, courage and maybe a touch of new love.

programme.title: Fixing Up Christmas
programme.desc: (2021) Deck the halls with Natalie Dreyfuss. When a workaholic executive hires a festive fixer for his family's company Christmas party, sparks fly, ornaments drop and love comes down the chimney.

programme.title: Click and Collect
programme.desc: (2018) Comic caper with Stephen Merchant. Mismatched neighbours Andrew and Dev go on a reluctant cross-country road trip to buy a sparkly and elusive Christmas present for Andrew's young daughter.

programme.title: Twinkle All The Way
programme.desc: (2019) Festive romance with Sarah Drew. Two single parents find themselves growing closer as they juggle a wedding and a VIP Christmas Eve party, discovering love in unexpected places.

programme.desc: (2018) Festive romance with Eric Mabius. Developer Madison visits Christmas, Colorado, for a ski resort development plan but finds community and holiday magic. Will progress threaten the town's charm?

programme.desc: Sophie is the proud owner of the perfect Christmas getaway destination. Will her blossoming relationship with a guest end when she discovers his ulterior motive for staying at Holly Lodge? (2017)

programme.desc: Allie is from the magical small-town of Evergreen. Will her wish for a romantic Christmas come true after a series of events seemingly transpire against her? Starring Ashley Williams. (2017)

Steve and his four friends - Lenny, Mike, Rick and Dennis - manage to persuade Dinah, symbol of a nationwide 'Eat Meat' advertising campaign, to escape from the false values of the commercial world.

programme.title: Die Kultschrauber
programme.desc: In Tom's Roadhouse soll ein achtzigjähriger Ford ein paar PS zulegen, während die Porsche-Experten von 9elf einen äußerst seltenen Carrera 3.0 auf dem Weg zur erfolgreichen Hauptuntersuchung betreuen. Bei Il Motore steht ein Kellerfund vor der Entkernung: neuer Motor für einen alten Fiat 500. Eine top erhaltene DDR-Simson S50 findet ihren Weg zu den Spezialisten der Flying Classics.

programme.title: Die Kultschrauber
programme.desc: Der Name ist Programm: Bei Il Motore dreht sich fast alles um Antriebsmaschinen. Minustemperaturen für die luftgekühlte Rarität von 9elf: Eisstrahlung beim Carrera 3.0. In der Halle der Flying Classics wartet ein schick überholtes Kultmoped auf die Abholung. Für eine Handvoll PS mehr muss sich der betagte Ford in Tom's Roadhouse von seinem Getriebe verabschieden.

programme.title: Die Kultschrauber
programme.desc: Korrosion mit Coolnessfaktor: Auf dem Hof der Flying Classics landet eine Simson Schwalbe im Rost-Design. Die Porsche-Experten von 9elf verpassen dem frisch gestrahlten Carrera ein komplettes Check-up. In der Werkstatt von Il Motore wirkt strahlender Sand wahre Wunder. Motortausch für eine amerikanische Legende: In Tom's Roadhouse wartet ein Mustang auf seine neue Maschine.

programme.title: Die Kultschrauber
programme.desc: Für den Carrera schlägt die Stunde der Wahrheit. Wird das edle Sammlerstück dem kritischen Prüfer-Blick standhalten? Der Il Motore-Chef jagt einen asiatischen Kultflitzer Marke Datsun auf den Leistungsstand. Geduldsprobe für den Vespa-Experten: Die Kupplung einer alten spanischen Vespa wird zum Problemfall. Auch die Montage des neuen Mustang-Motors wird zur kniffligen Herausforderung.

programme.title: Die Kultschrauber
programme.desc: Das Team 9elf steigt um. Statt mit Porsche geben die PS-Experten im VW-Beetle Gas auf der Rennstrecke. Ein betagter Italiener muss sich beweisen. Läuft der bei Il Motore überholte Fiat-Motor problemlos? In Tom's Roadhouse bekommt das Ford-Hot Rod seine Achsen zurück. Wird die Problem-Kupplung der spanischen Vespa nach furioser Feinarbeit der Flying Classics wieder funktionieren?

programme.title: Die Kultschrauber
programme.desc: Ein Traumcabrio wartet bei Il Motore auf seine Motorrevision. Der Cadillac DeVille bringt die Fans von edlen Classic Cars zum Schwärmen. Das Team 9elf muss einen Porsche mit gestopften Rostlöchern durch die GTÜ-Prüfung bekommen. Außeneinsätze für die blaue Schwalbe bei den Flying Classics und den Mustang aus Tom's Roadhouse. Sind die Werkstatt-Eingriffe gut verlaufen?

programme.title: Klein aber fein
programme.desc: Der Airport der Nordseeinsel Sylt ist der nördlichste Verkehrsflughafen Deutschlands. In den Sommermonaten herrscht auf den zwei Start- und Landebahnen reger Flugbetrieb. Dann schlägt die große Stunde des kleinen, aber multifunktionalen Technikteams. Die Luftfahrt-Profis führen von der Einweisung der Maschinen, dem Be- und Entladen, der Betankung und Reinigung alles in Eigenregie durch.

programme.title: Phänomen Sonnenfinsternis
programme.desc: Im Jahr 2017 fanden zwei Sonnenfinsternisse statt. Millionen von Menschen beobachteten gebannt, wie der Mond die Sonne bedeckte und seinen Schatten auf die Erde warf. Am 26. Februar bedeckte der Mond die Sonne zu mehr als 99 Prozent. In Nordamerika dauerte die totale Sonnenfinsternis vom 21. August 90 Minuten, und der Kernschatten überstrich insgesamt 14 Bundesstaaten.

programme.title: Die Jagd nach der dunklen Materie
programme.desc: Das CERN und die University of California, Santa Barbara sind zusammen auf der Suche nach einer flüchtigen Substanz, die das Universum zusammenhält, wie Physiker und Astronomen glauben: Dunkle Materie. Wie weit ist die Forschung im Bereich der Teilchenphysik vorangeschritten und was kommt als nächstes?

programme.title: Mysteriöses Signal aus dem All
programme.desc: Im Green-Bank-Observatorium tief in den Bergen des US-Bundesstaates West Virginia werden rätselhafte Signale empfangen. Könnte dies ein Hinweis auf die Existenz von Leben und sogar anderen Zivilisationen im All sein? Das größte voll bewegliche Radioteleskop der Welt, mit dem Pulsare, Schwarze Löcher und andere interstellare Phänomene beobachtet werden, soll eine Antwort auf diese Frage geben.

programme.title: Geniale Zufälle
programme.desc: Die erfolglose Suche nach einem sichereren Kühlmittel führt zur Erfindung von Teflon, eine beschädigte Lieferkiste zur Erfindung von Dynamit. Eine zufällige Begegnung zwischen dem Hollywoodstar Hedy Lamarr und einem Komponisten ebnet den Weg für WLAN - und Pawlows Hundeexperiment für unsere Handysucht.

programme.title: Geniale Zufälle
programme.desc: Ein fehlgeschlagenes Experiment beschert uns das wichtigste Werkzeug zur Verbrechensbekämpfung. Ständig reißende Arbeiterhosen führen zur Erfindung von Kunststoff. Ein zufälliges Gespräch und ein Wurstgift verändern das Gesicht Hollywoods für immer. Und ein kaputtes Thermometer setzt eine Kette von Ereignissen in Gang, die ein Land vom Kolonialismus befreien.

programme.title: Geniale Zufälle
programme.desc: Durch ungeschicktes Hantieren landet eine Probe auf einem Herd, was zur Entdeckung von vulkanisiertem Gummi führt. Ein Griff nach dem falschen Widerstand beschert uns den Herzschrittmacher. Ein fehlgeschlagenes Experiment führt zu einer sicheren Methode zur Erzeugung von Flammen. Und die Suche nach neuen Galaxien könnte uns mit Außerirdischen in Kontakt bringen.

programme.title: Geniale Zufälle
programme.desc: Die Dämpfe eines zerbrochenen Thermometers führen zur Erfindung der Fotografie. Radarteile und ein schmelzender Schokoriegel besiegeln den Siegeszug der Mikrowelle. Und als ein potenzielles Herzmedikament in Studien getestet wird, stellt man fest, dass es auf ein anderes Organ viel stärker wirkt. Später wird es unter dem Namen Viagra bekannt.

programme.title: Geniale Zufälle
programme.desc: Ein dreckiges Labor und ein Urlaub führen zur Entdeckung unserer ersten wirksamen Waffe gegen Bakterien: Penicillin. Die Entschlossenheit eines Wissenschaftlers, die "falsche" Lösung zu testen, beschert uns einen besonders starken Kunststoff. Und aus einem nicht funktionierenden Laser wird die LED-Leuchte.

programme.title: Geniale Zufälle
programme.desc: Als der Schweizer Chemiker Albert Hofmann an einem Kreislaufmedikament forscht, entdeckt er zufällig LSD. Ein deutscher Chemiker hingegen will eigentlich einen Farbstoff herstellen, doch es entsteht hochexplosives TNT. Außerdem spielt ein mit Urin gefüllter Kühlschrank eine Rolle bei der Verbesserung der psychiatrischen Versorgung.

programme.title: Geniale Zufälle
programme.desc: Ein gescheitertes Blutdruckmedikament und unerwartet starker Haarwuchs bei einer Frau führen zu einem Mittel gegen Glatzen. Ein Versuch, das Kräuseln des Papiers in einem Zeitungsdrucker zu verhindern, beschert uns die Klimaanlage. Und auch Wilhelm Röntgen wurde bei seiner größten Erfindung vom Zufall unterstützt.

programme.title: Geniale Zufälle
programme.desc: Ein junger Medizinstudent glaubt, dass es einen Zusammenhang zwischen der Kopfform und der Intelligenz seiner Kommilitonen gibt und prägt damit die Neurowissenschaft. Als ein Chemiker im Zweiten Weltkrieg nach transparentem Kunststoff für Zielfernrohre forscht, entdeckt er nebenbei den Sekundenkleber. Und auch das Bier verdanken wir einer Reihe von Zufällen.

programme.title: Geniale Zufälle
programme.desc: Ein missglückter Versuch, eine Plastiktapete herzustellen, führt zur Erfindung von Luftpolsterfolie. Die Vorstufe eines Mittels zur Blutstillung wird zur Partydroge MDMA, auch bekannt als Ecstasy. Ein Missgeschick im Labor führt zur Entdeckung von Schießbaumwolle. Und ein defektes Satellitenobjektiv verbessert die Brustkrebsvorsorge.

programme.title: Geniale Zufälle
programme.desc: Klebeband spielt eine Rolle bei bedeutendsten Entdeckungen in der Materialwissenschaft des 21. Jahrhunderts. Ein Fehler bei der Herstellung von Bonbons erschafft ein erfolgreiches Abführmittel. Ein wenig erfolgreicher Sekundenkleber beschert uns Post-it-Klebezettel. Und ein Spaziergang im Schnee führt beinahe zum nuklearen Armageddon.

programme.title: Geniale Zufälle
programme.desc: Ein Metall, das eigentlich für Gewehrläufe entwickelt wurde, ist schon bald aus keiner Küche mehr wegzudenken: rostfreier Stahl. Ein Sack Erde von einer abgelegenen Insel enthält ein Bakterium, das die Alterung aufhält. Und das Entfernen von Kletten aus dem Fell eines Hundes führt zur Erfindung des Klettverschlusses.

programme.title: Geniale Zufälle
programme.desc: Auf der Suche nach einer künstlichen Form von Chinin entsteht zufällig der erste künstliche Farbstoff, Mauvein. Ein gescheitertes Reinigungsmittel führt zur Erfindung von Frischhaltefolie. Bei einem Versuch, Bakterien im Labor zu züchten, wird ein Krebsmedikament entdeckt. Und Krankenschwestern an der Westfront erfinden die Damenbinde.

programme.title: Phänomen Sonnenfinsternis
programme.desc: Im Jahr 2017 fanden zwei Sonnenfinsternisse statt. Millionen von Menschen beobachteten gebannt, wie der Mond die Sonne bedeckte und seinen Schatten auf die Erde warf. Am 26. Februar bedeckte der Mond die Sonne zu mehr als 99 Prozent. In Nordamerika dauerte die totale Sonnenfinsternis vom 21. August 90 Minuten, und der Kernschatten überstrich insgesamt 14 Bundesstaaten.

Eine zufällige Begegnung zwischen dem Hollywoodstar Hedy Lamarr und einem Komponisten ebnet den Weg für WLAN - und Pawlows Hundeexperiment für unsere Handysucht.

programme.title: Love Finds you in Valentine- In der Heimat wohnt das Glück
programme.desc: Kennedy Blaine (Michaela McManus) hat eine Ranch in der Nähe der Westernstadt Valentine in Nebraska geerbt. Doch was soll ein echtes California Girl mit ein paar Hektar staubigem Land in der Wildnis anfangen? Am besten ist es, es gleich wieder zu verkaufen. Doch dazu muss sie erst einmal dorthin … und erlebt eine Überraschung. Nicht nur, dass ihr Land wunderschön ist, auch Derek Sterling (Diogo Morgado), der bislang als Verwalter eingesetzt war, erweist sich als durchaus charmant...

programme.title: Süßer Herbst
programme.desc: Maggie erbt Ahornsüßwarengeschäft mit Dex. Gemeinsam entdecken sie die Wünsche ihrer Tante.

programme.title: Liebe auf Rezept
programme.desc: Claire ist eine Krankenschwester, deren Vorgesetzter stets versucht, ihr das Leben schwer zu machen. An einem freien Abend steckt sie gemeinsam mit einem charmanten Mann in einem Aufzug fest.

programme.title: Anleitung zum Verlieben
programme.desc: Die erfolgreiche Unternehmerin Cassandra 'Cass' Barber (Meghan Markle) verliebt sich immer in die falschen Männer - und wagt deshalb ein Experiment mit dem Selbsthilfebuch "The Dater's Handbook" von Beziehungsexpertin Dr. Susie (Teryl Rothery). Sie befolgt jeden Ratschlag und hat schließlich die Wahl zwischen dem verlässlichen George (Jonathan Scarfe) und dem lebensfrohen Robert (Kristoffer Polaha). Aber was tun, wenn die Fachliteratur das eine, und das Herz was ganz anderes sagt? Für wen wird sich Cass entscheiden?

programme.title: Der Liebhaber
programme.desc: 5 Jahre nach dem Tod ihres Sohnes will Tess leben, doch die Besessenheit eines Soldaten stürzt sie ins Chaos.

programme.title: Aufruf zur Liebe
programme.desc: Samantha und Jake verlieben sich ineinander, nachdem er in ihre Show eintritt, in der verlorene Lieben wieder vereint werden.

programme.title: 10 Wahrheiten über die Liebe
programme.desc: HANNAH, eine Liebeskolumnistin, glaubt, die Liebe geklärt zu haben, bis ihr Freund mit ihr Schluss macht.

programme.title: Love Finds you in Valentine- In der Heimat wohnt das Glück
programme.desc: Kennedy Blaine (Michaela McManus) hat eine Ranch in der Nähe der Westernstadt Valentine in Nebraska geerbt. programme.title: Mit Liebe für Sie gemacht
programme.desc: Second-Hand-Brautkleidbesitzerin gibt gebrauchten Kleidern neues Leben. Fürchtet sich vor zweiter Liebeschance.

programme.title: Liebe in der Übersetzung
programme.desc: Linguistik-Ph.D. Julie lehrt Französisch auf unterhaltsame Weise. Funken fliegen, wenn sie mit dem gutaussehenden Museums-Kurator Dan zusammenarbeitet.

programme.title: BMX Film: Go Fast Pull Up
programme.desc: Die Evolution des BMX von den 80ern zu den 90ern. Go Fast Pull Up wirft einen Blick auf das Leben des BMX-Fahrers Jimmy LeVan und seine Rolle in der Geschichte des Sports.

programme.title: Ultimate Rush S4 E2: Slackline-Weltrekord Versuch
programme.desc: Profi-Slackliner Alex Schulz versucht den Highline-Weltrekord mit einer luftigen Traverse in China zu brechen.

programme.title: Die Clip Show: Extremkayaken in Südamerika
programme.desc: In dieser Clip Show geht's ans Limit: Mit dem Kayak über die wildesten Flüsse Chiles und ein Bike-Run von Brandon Semenuk – in einem Take, ohne Schnitt. Maximale Action, minimaler Atem.

programme.title: 7 Alpengipfel in 7 Tagen: Weltrekord im Alleingang
programme.desc: Extremsportler Michael Strasser schreibt Geschichte: In nur 7 Tagen erklimmt er solo und ohne Hilfe die höchsten Gipfel der 7 Alpenländer – ein neuer Weltrekord im Grenzbereich des Machbaren.

programme.title: ABC of ... S1 E17: BMXen
programme.desc: BMX hat eine lange Geschichte voller Athleten, die den Sport immer weiter vorangetrieben haben. Von den Anfängen bis heute – wie Pioniere und Innovationen BMX zu dem gemacht haben, was es heute ist.

programme.title: Doku: OUTDEH
programme.desc: Drei junge Jamaikaner erzählen ihre Geschichten. Rapper Bakersteez hofft auf eine internationale Karriere, Shama will Jamaikas erster Pro-Surfer werden und Romar zeigt uns das Leben in seiner Gemeinde

programme.title: Musik Film: Walk it Home
programme.desc: Die Wanton Bishops sind eine Band aus Beirut, Libanon, die Blues spielen, als wären sie im Bayou von Louisiana, USA, geboren. Dies ist die Geschichte ihrer ersten Reise in die Vereinigten Staaten.

programme.title: Red Bull Symphonic: Loredana & Symphonieorchester Live
programme.desc: Ein einmaliges Konzert: Deutschrap Star Loredana trifft beim Red Bull Symphonic auf der Bühne des KKL in Luzern auf ein Symphonieorchester.

programme.title: ABC of... S2 E1: Klettern
programme.desc: Erfahre Wissenswertes über einige der härtesten Sportarten und Wettkämpfe der Welt. Vom Verstehen des Fachjargons bis hin zur Kenntnis der Regeln – dies ist der perfekte Crashkurs.

programme.title: Screenland S1 E1: Die Welt der Träume durch VR
programme.desc: Die Welt der Träume wird durch Virtual Reality greifbar - moderne Technologien ermöglichen Videospiele an die Grenzen der Vorstellungskraft zu bringen.

programme.title: Best of Red Bull Seifenkistenrennen 2018
programme.desc: Dünne Räder, ein schmaler Radstand und ein hohes Chassis sind ein Rezept für heftige Stürze bei Seifenkistenrennen - und die größten Unfälle des Jahres 2018 sind der Beweis dafür.

programme.title: F1-Bolide bahnt sich Weg durch britischen Stau
programme.desc: Der RB7 im britischen Stau: Der legendäre F1-Bolide bahnt sich mit Tempo und Witz den Weg durch Taxis, Studentenautos und schräge Verkehrsteilnehmer – ein rasantes Rennen mit britischem Humor.

programme.title: LIVE
programme.desc: Schau dir jetzt das Rennen des MotoGP™ Großer Preis von Indonesien an.

programme.title: Skate Doku: Red Bull Drop In Tour 2024 in Südamerika
programme.desc: Ryan Sheckler, Jamie Foy und die Crew landen auf dem skate-verrücktesten Kontinent der Welt - Südamerika. Die Pros touren quer durch Brasilien, Argentinien und Chile.

programme.title: More than a Dive 2025 E1: El Nido
programme.desc: Die Saison 2025 startet in El Nido – einem der wildesten und ursprünglichsten Natur-Schauplätze der Tour. Iffland feiert ihr 50. Podium. Hunt kehrt als Wildcard zurück und holt sich erneut den Sieg.

programme.title: Screenland S1 E2: Ein Twitch-Streamer über seine Sucht
programme.desc: Der Neustart eines Computers ist einfach, ein paar Klicks und alles läuft wieder. Doch was braucht es, um einen Menschen neu zu starten? Ein Twitch-Streamer kämpft gegen die Sucht und einen Neuanfang.

programme.title: Explorers S1 E2: Sintflut am Sambesi
programme.desc: Der südafrikanische Kajaker und Abenteurer Steve Fisher plant das riskanteste Projekt seiner Karriere: Er kämpft sich durch die engen Schluchten des Zambezi unter den Viktoriafällen.

programme.title: Best of Red Bull Seifenkistenrennen 2018
programme.desc: Dünne Räder, ein schmaler Radstand und ein hohes Chassis sind ein Rezept für heftige Stürze bei Seifenkistenrennen - und die größten Unfälle des Jahres 2018 sind der Beweis dafür.

programme.title: LIVE: DTM am Hockenheimring
programme.desc: Sieh dir das Rennen am Sonntag beim achten DTM-Stopp auf dem Hockenheimring in voller Länge im Video an.

programme.title: Solo am Wasserfall: Eiskletterer an der 1000-Meter-Wand
programme.desc: Ein Eiskletterer wagt das Unvorstellbare: einen freien Solo-Aufstieg an einem 1000 Meter hohen gefrorenen Wasserfall – ohne Seil, ohne Sicherung, doch mit der Bereitschaft, alles zu riskieren.

programme.title: Bike Doku: Freeride-Mountainbiking neu definiert
programme.desc: Eine neue Generation von Freeride-Mountainbikerinnen sprengt Limits: Patricia Druwen, Thomas Genon und Emil Johansson erobern neues Terrain – mit Style, Mut und grenzenloser Kreativität.

programme.title: BMX-Doku: Der erste Skatepark für Nigeria
programme.desc: BMX-Profi Courage Adams reist in seine Heimat Lagos, um dort den ersten Skatepark Nigerias mitzugestalten – ein Meilenstein für die lokale Szene und ein Impuls für die nächste Generation von Ridern.

programme.title: Screenland S1 E2: Ein Twitch-Streamer über seine Sucht
programme.desc: Der Neustart eines Computers ist einfach, ein paar Klicks und alles läuft wieder. Doch was braucht es, um einen Menschen neu zu starten? Ein Twitch-Streamer kämpft gegen die Sucht und einen Neuanfang.

programme.title: The CHI Jackers
programme.desc: The Wolves have become strong because of the stolen CHI. And now they are stealing even more. Soon all the other tribes of CHIMA have none. Laval and Eris must find a new, clever and “Wolf proof ” way to get CHI to the tribes.

programme.title: Symptoms!
programme.desc: Owen falls prey to the toxin of a poisonous prehistoric jungle flower and believes he's a raptor.

programme.title: Snow Way
programme.desc: Practicing for the local snow lodge's big snowboard race, Mia has an accident and hurts her ankle. She insists it's no biggie, but when she tries to resume practice, the normally fearless Mia finds she's now terrified of snowboarding! At the local snow lodge's Snowboard Meet, ace snowboarder Mia, trying to raise money for a new Heartlake City animal shelter, enters the fiercest race of all – the Boardercross. Then, while practicing, she has an accident and hurts her ankle. She insists it's no big deal, but once she heals and tries to resume practice, the usually fearless Mia finds she's now terrified of snowboarding! With the help of her Friends, she tries hard to overcome her fear, but her nightmarish visions of snowboard monsters and jeering snowmen have her shaking in her bed. She backs out of the race, disappointing her Friends and herself. Finally, when an avalanche traps Fiona, Mia is forced to overcome her fears and race to the rescue.

programme.title: Holiday Gift Swap Disaster
programme.desc: While the rest of the group gets creative and makes new, personalized gifts from scratch. In the end, it's a reminder that it's not about the gifts—it's about the thought and effort you put into showing you care.

programme.title: Day Of The Great Devourer
programme.desc: Disaster threatens as the ninja must fight to defeat the all consuming Great Devourer in a desperate attempt to save Ninjago.

programme.title: LEGO Marvel Super Heroes: Avengers Reassembled
programme.desc: Finally, the Avengers confront Ultron and his Ultron Minions as they attack Avengers' Tower. Ultron's ultimate plan: use all the data/stuff they've stolen to free the newly rebuilt IRON LEGION, destroy the Avengers, and control the world. Tony dons the hastily repaired Hulk Buster Armor and it's on! It's a huge battle as the Avengers try to save their beloved HQ and defeat Ultron. Will they succeed? And, more importantly, can their party be saved after Ultron tries to take down their Tower?The Avengers must now fight one of their own, and they're not sure what to do! Cap and Thor lead the charge, but can't fend off Iron Man and Ultron's Minions. Meanwhile, Black Widow, Hawkeye and Hulk track down a signal that seems to be controlling Iron Man from a castle in the “Little Sokovia” section of New York. There they fight HYDRA and BARON VON STRUCKER and learn that YELLOWJACKET is the “bug” that infected Iron Man's suit for Ultron. To help break Iron Man free from Ultron's control, the Aven

programme.title: The Book Of Obsession
programme.desc: The Knights are tasked with protecting the King's valuable Ned Knights comic book during the Bookingheim Knight-a-Con. But with all the costumed kids there, will they recognize the real Jestro and Book of Monsters coming to get them? King Halbert instructs the Knights that they must take his valuable Ned Knights comic book to the “Knight-a-Kon” in Bookingham. It will be the first be first prize at the Knight-a-Kon. But the Book of Monsters wants the book, too. Having devoured Ned Knightly comic books in it's down time it has become fanatically obsessed with the storyline. General Magmar suggests they simply attack the place and take what they want, but Jestro tells them they can't: everyone will be in costume and they'll be thousands of comics there. This calls for a clever “infiltration” mission (which will also allow Jestro to see the Kon, which he's always wanted to do.) So Jestro goes into the Kon with the BOM and some monsters. And it's easy because everyone is in costume Jestro,

programme.title: Crocodile Tears
programme.desc: Cragger and the Crocodiles are taken prisoners by the Wolves. But Laval is determined to free his old friend. Laval, Eris and the mysterious ShadoWind attempt a rescue ... but something about ShadoWind isn't quite right.

programme.title: The Monsters and the Mech!
programme.desc: Hudson desperately recruits powerful help to defeat Danny once and for all - in the form of the T-Rex.

programme.title: The Snowball Effect
programme.desc: Laval and Li'Ella's relationship grows as he gives her a tour of the Lion City. But distracted, he misses a key battle against the Hunters. Tormak joins the fight and saves the day. But the Lion King Lagravis is captured and brought to the Ice Fort. Who will lead the Lions now?!?

programme.title: The Spectral Lands
programme.desc: Arin ventures into a dangerous new land to heal Ras while Nya and Kai come up with a plan to make Jay come to them.

programme.title: The Great Zane Robbery
programme.desc: Zane's search for Arin leads to an old friend but lands him in the middle of the Forbidden Five's hunt for the Prismatic Blades.

programme.title: Legendary Places, Ninjago's Most Wanted
programme.desc: Cole joins Jay and Zane inside the Nindroid to solve a mysterious puzzle and also Kai enters Zane's mind and suggests the Ninja take a break from puzzle-solving to figure out which villain is trying to hack their friend.

programme.title: LEGO Marvel Super Heroes: Avengers Reassembled
programme.desc: The Avengers prepare for a party with a surprise guest when Ultron crashes the preparations by using mind control on Iron Man. While trying to rescue their leader, the rest of the team discovers that Baron Stucker, HYDRA, and Yellowjacket are in on Ultron's plans. While preparing for a party at Avengers' Tower, THE AVENGERS (IRON MAN, CAPTAIN AMERICA, BLACK WIDOW, HAWKEYE, THOR, HULK and VISION) notice Iron Man acting strangely. When Iron Man volunteers to go out and get more ice, they find it odd: when has Tony every volunteered to get anything? Suddenly, ULTRON appears on a screen: he's taken control of Iron Man! To make matters worse, Ultron takes over all the versions of Iron Man's armor and they fly off!Finally, the Avengers confront Ultron and his Ultron Minions as they attack Avengers' Tower. programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: When a man's naked body is found at the centre of a crop circle and more corpses begin turning up with peculiar injuries, DCI Barnaby has to uncover who is responsible - or are extraterrestrial powers really at work in Midsomer?

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Let Us Prey Barnaby and Nelson investigate a series of murders in Midsomer St Claire. The crimes appear to be inspired by the macabre images on a medieval fresco recently discovered in the church crypt.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Days of Misrule Barnaby and Jones are called away from a hated team-building exercise to investigate an explosion at a haulage yard run by Territorial Army officer Matt Parkes and his ruthless son James. James is involved in some shady activities, but is he capable of arson or murder? When a body turns up, there are plenty of other suspects on the scene, including a peace protestor and a host of trained killers at the TA.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Talking to the Dead Two couples vanish without trace from the village of Monks Barton amid rumours of witchcraft and haunted woods. Flamboyant psychic Cyrus LeVanu clashes with pompous cleric Wallace Stone as a body is found, while other villagers seem to be caught up in a stolen antiques racket.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: The Green Man An accident during the restoration of a canal leads to a particularly difficult case for Barnaby and Troy, which appears to be linked to a group of rowdy teenagers.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Sergeant Dan Scott arrives to work with Barnaby and is thrown straight into a murder investigation in Midsomer Mallow. A noise heard near the scene of Fiona Thompson's bloodstained body leads police to suspect an odd-job man, but when the murder toll rises, Barnaby becomes concerned for Cully, who is organising a ten-year school reunion.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Womanising landowner Gareth Heldman is killed by a violent blow from a Celtic spear, reawakening memories of a tragic archaeological dig at the ancient mound of Midsomer Barrow.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: When a survivalist is found murdered in his bombproof shelter, Barnaby unravels a dark conspiracy to reveal how far people will go to escape the end of the world.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Gated estate Challis Court is a tight-knit community for retired police officers, but when a new arrival is found dead, the other residents regard the murder as an affront. Barnaby realizes that the killer is likely an ex-police officer.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Pastry chef Chrissie Larkton's mill has been in her family for centuries. She restored it and turned it into a thriving online business, but the popularity has overshadowed Lower Blissingham, and many of the villagers are not happy about it.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders

programme.desc: The Teletubbies see a little girl and her brother who love salad. They go shopping in a market a market with their grandma to buy some salad to eat.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies watch two boys make Chinese Lanterns with their uncle. In Teletubbyland, it is time for Tubby Toast, but where has Laa-Laa's toast gone?

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies and some children learn about the colour blue. In Teletubbyland Po is watching the blue sky when it begins to rain.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: Noo-Noo tidies up Home hill before the Teletubbies slide up the slide to watch Natalie tell us about her brother's christening.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies watch Sarah and Mark give their sheep a winter-feed. In Teletubbyland, the Teletubbies cannot decide whether to have Tubby Custard or Tubby Toast.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies leave their favourite things to watch some boys spinning some spinning tops to celebrate the Hanukah festival. Tinky Winky wears the skirt on his head to do a very special round and round dance.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: A voice trumpet rises to tell the Teletubbies 'Christmas is a Coming'. They hurry up the slide to see some children decorate a Christmas Tree. The Teletubbies get excited when their own Christmas Tree appears in Teletubbyland.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies watch some children making Christmas cards. Laa-Laa's present is some lovely decorations. When Noo-Noo tidies them up they tickle his throat, so he throws them out to decorate Home Hill.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: Two children are making Christmas crackers for each other. Dipsy is very pleased to find his present is a cracker. He looks for someone to pull the cracker. It makes a lovely pink bang and the Teletubbies laugh when they fall over.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: A voice trumpet appears and teaches the Teletubbies a winter nursery rhyme. Po's present is a little frosty cloud that begins to snow. All the Teletubbies laugh as they play in the snow.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies see some children visit a level crossing and watch a train pass by. The Teletubbies play their Ready, Steady, Go game.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies play a slide game before watching Becky and Jed look for eggs on their farm. Then their mum cooks them for their tea. In Teletubbyland, the Lion and Bear play their hide and seek game.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: Alex Pascall and some children sing to their dolls to rock them to sleep. Laa-Laa wants to sing a lovely song, but Tinky Winky is crunching his Tubby Toast too loudly!

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: Laa-Laa dances with her ball. A little boy tells us why he likes to live in his block of flats. A balloon appears in Teletubbyland. The Teletubbies follow a balloon.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies giggle as they play their 'Through the Arch' game. The windmill stops them to watch a little girl and her dad go for a walk in the town.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies line up to say 'Eh-oh' and then watch Matthew and Mark feed a baby calf. The Teletubbies play a game to see who can eat their Tubby Custard the slowest, but Po can't wait and eats her Tubby Custard very fast.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies and some children watch Tamzin Griffin pretend to be Funny Lady and tell the story of the Naughty Pig. Dipsy's hat keeps blowing away and he has to chase it all over Teletubbyland.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Tubbies crawl through the arch in Home Hill and watch Alex Pascall and some children sing 'Handy Hands'.

programme.title: Teletubbies

programme.title: Teletubbies

programme.title: Teletubbies

programme.title: Dressmaking Tools
programme.desc: From measuring and marking to cutting and finishing, explore the essential gadgets that make every dressmaking project easier and more precise.

programme.title: Singin' in the Rain
programme.desc: When the transition is being made from silent films to `talkies', everyone has trouble adapting. Don and Lina have been cast repeatedly as a romantic couple, but when their latest film is remade into a musical, only Don has the voice for the new singing part. After a lot of practise with a diction coach, Lina still sounds terrible, and Kathy, a bright young aspiring actress, is hired to record over her voice.

programme.title: Ted
programme.desc: When John Bennett was a little boy, he made a wish that Ted, his beloved teddy bear, would come alive. Thirty years later, foul-mouthed Ted is still John's constant companion, much to the chagrin of Lori, John's girlfriend. Though Lori's displeasure is exacerbated by the pair's constant consumption of beer and weed, she's not the one who's most disappointed with John; it may take the intervention of John's boyhood toy to help him grow up at last.

programme.title: Ted 2
programme.desc: Teddy bear Ted seeks legal help from a young lawyer and a legendary civil-rights attorney when the law declares him to be property and not a person.

programme.title: The Longest Yard
programme.desc: Paul `Wrecking' Crewe was a revered football superstar back in his day, but that time has since faded. When a messy drunk driving incident lands him in jail, Paul finds he was specifically requested by Warden Hazen, a duplicitous prison official well aware of Paul's athletic skills. Paul has been assigned the task of assembling a team of convicts, to square off in a big football game against the sadistic guards.

programme.title: Nacho Libre
programme.desc: Brother Ignacio is an orphanage chef who cooks up a plan to earn money for the kids by becoming a Mexican wrestling star. First, he must don a leotard.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: When a plot by a dangerous criminal organisation endangers the beach, Mitch Buchannon leads his elite squad of lifeguards on a mission to prove that one doesn't need to wear a badge to save the bay.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the films playing on Sky Cinema in October 2025, plus other highlights airing on Sky.

programme.title: David Brent: Life on the Road
programme.desc: David Brent is on tour with his band `Foregone Conclusion.' However, tickets sales are not enough to keep the band afloat so Brent has to dip into his pension. Meanwhile, he is being filmed for what he believes will be a documentary, like Martin Scorsese did with The Rolling Stones, but it if for a `where are they now' style documentary.

programme.title: Housesitter
programme.desc: Newton Davis builds a dream home for his childhood sweetheart and is promptly dumped. Devastated, he seeks solace in the arms of a waitress, but sneaks off into the night once he's had his fun. The spurned waitress exacts her revenge by moving into the empty house and masquerading as Newton's wife. At this stage, things start getting complicated.

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
programme.desc: Scott Pilgrim plays bass guitar in a struggling Toronto-based band and pines after his ex-girlfriend, now a success in her own band. At a party he meets Ramona Flowers and instantly is smitten, but in his pursuit of her he is attacked by Matthew Patel who informs Scott that he is the first of seven evil exes that Scott will have to defeat in order to win Ramona.

programme.title: The Holdovers
programme.desc: Forced to spend Christmas break with a handful of students, a curmudgeonly instructor at a New England prep school develops an unlikely bond with a brainy troublemaker and the head cook.

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: A guy is getting married, but his alter-ego keeps breaking through. Determined to rid himself of his pesky partner, he extracts his alter-ego's genes, but an accident and a dog hair see the later-ego take on his own life. Unaware of his existence, the man and his wife perfect their new rejuvenation formula and their fortune seems assured until his alter-ego steals it.

programme.title: Ted
programme.desc: When John Bennett was a little boy, he made a wish that Ted, his beloved teddy bear, would come alive. Thirty years later, foul-mouthed Ted is still John's constant companion, much to the chagrin of Lori, John's girlfriend. Though Lori's displeasure is exacerbated by the pair's constant consumption of beer and weed, she's not the one who's most disappointed with John; it may take the intervention of John's boyhood toy to help him grow up at last.

programme.title: Ted 2
programme.desc: Teddy bear Ted seeks legal help from a young lawyer and a legendary civil-rights attorney when the law declares him to be property and not a person.

programme.title: The Hangover
programme.desc: Two days before his wedding, Doug and three friends drive to Las Vegas for a wild and memorable stag party. In fact, when the three groomsmen wake up the next morning, they can't remember a thing, nor can they find Doug. With little time to spare, the three hazy pals try to re-trace their steps and find Doug so they can get him back to Los Angeles in time to walk down the aisle.

programme.title: The Hangover Part II
programme.desc: A group of friends go to Thailand for a quiet and restrained stag party, but are dismayed to wake up in a mysterious hotel room, with a man missing and no memory of the night before. Of course, Alan manages to get himself in with the crowd.

programme.title: The Hangover Part III
programme.desc: It's been two years since the gang have narrowly escaped disaster in Bangkok. Now the gang have happy lives at home, but Alan doesn't. Still lacking a sense of purpose, Alan has gone off his meds and surrendered to his natural impulses.

programme.title: Love Actually
programme.desc: Weaving in and out of the love lives of eight loosely inter-related couples. The bachelor Prime Minister falls for his personal assistant, his brother-in-law is flirting with one of his colleagues, a writer heads off to France and pursues an affair with a maid, and an 11-year-old boy asks his father for advice on matters of the heart.

programme.title: Kangaroo Jack
programme.desc: Two childhood friends get caught up in with the mob in New York and find themselves forced to travel to Australia to deliver $50,000. Their trouble really starts when they reach the outback, and a kangaroo bounds away with the cash.

programme.title: Parenthood
programme.desc: An over-protective dad, determined to do a better job than his own distant father, anxiously dotes on his troubled eight-year-old son. His brother, meanwhile, strives to mould his toddler daughter into an academic high-flyer, and his sister struggles with two rebellious, angst-ridden teenagers.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Saturday Night
programme.desc: To celebrate the release of the film `Saturday Night', we explore 50 years of hilarious films from the SNL cast - including `Wayne's World', `Bridesmaids' and more.

programme.title: Nacho Libre
programme.desc: Brother Ignacio is an orphanage chef who cooks up a plan to earn money for the kids by becoming a Mexican wrestling star. First, he must don a leotard.

programme.title: The Men Who Stare at Goats
programme.desc: A reporter in Iraq may just have the story of a lifetime when he meets Lyn Cassady, a guy who claims to be a former member of the US Army's New Earth Army, a unit that employs paranormal powers in their missions.

programme.title: Mr. Deeds
programme.desc: Deeds is much-loved in his small town, but following the death of a long-lost uncle, who also happens to be a billionaire tycoon, Deeds inherits a fortune and heads for the big city to run his uncle's company. When a media frenzy ensues surrounding Deeds' inheritance, reporter Babe Bennett goes undercover to out Deeds as the small-town fool she thinks he is.

programme.title: The Hangover
programme.desc: Two days before his wedding, Doug and three friends drive to Las Vegas for a wild and memorable stag party. In fact, when the three groomsmen wake up the next morning, they can't remember a thing, nor can they find Doug. With little time to spare, the three hazy pals try to re-trace their steps and find Doug so they can get him back to Los Angeles in time to walk down the aisle.

programme.title: The Hangover Part II
programme.desc: A group of friends go to Thailand for a quiet and restrained stag party, but are dismayed to wake up in a mysterious hotel room, with a man missing and no memory of the night before. Of course, Alan manages to get himself in with the crowd.

programme.title: The Hangover Part III
programme.desc: It's been two years since the gang have narrowly escaped disaster in Bangkok. Now the gang have happy lives at home, but Alan doesn't. Still lacking a sense of purpose, Alan has gone off his meds and surrendered to his natural impulses.

programme.title: Crazy Rich Asians
programme.desc: Rachel Chu is happy to accompany her longtime boyfriend, Nick, to his best friend's wedding in Singapore. She's also surprised to learn that Nick's family is extremely wealthy and he's considered one of the country's most eligible bachelors. Thrust into the spotlight, Rachel must now contend with jealous socialites, quirky relatives and something far, far worse: Nick's disapproving mother.

programme.title: Bad Teacher
programme.desc: A rude, drug-abusing educator vies with a perky colleague for the attentions of a rich and handsome substitute teacher.

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: A 450lb scientist falls for his new colleague, but out on a date, he's humiliated by a nightclub comedian about his weight. Upset and depressed, he takes a potion he's only tested previously on hamsters. He ends up turning into a svelte and cool-talking babe-magnet.

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: A guy is getting married, but his alter-ego keeps breaking through. Determined to rid himself of his pesky partner, he extracts his alter-ego's genes, but an accident and a dog hair see the later-ego take on his own life. Unaware of his existence, the man and his wife perfect their new rejuvenation formula and their fortune seems assured until his alter-ego steals it.

programme.title: Galaxy Quest
programme.desc: The stars of a 1970s sci-fi show - now scraping a living through re-runs and sci-fi conventions - are beamed aboard an alien spacecraft. Believing the cast's heroic on-screen dramas are historical documents of real-life adventures, the band of aliens turn to the ailing celebrities for help in their quest to overcome the oppressive regime in their solar system.

programme.title: Superbad
programme.desc: Two inseparable best friends navigate the last weeks of high school and are invited to a gigantic house party. Together with their nerdy friend, they spend a long day trying to score enough alcohol to supply the party and inebriate two girls in order to kick-start their sex lives before they go off to college. Their quest is complicated after one of them falls in with two inept cops who are determined to show him a good time.

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: Nick, Dale and Kurt all despise their bosses, but who would be crazy enough to quit their jobs in such poor economic times? The trio drunkenly and hypothetically discuss how to kill their bosses, and before they know it, they've hired a murder consultant to help them pull off the three deeds.

programme.title: Role Models
programme.desc: Danny is sour after driving away his girlfriend, and Wheeler is into anything wearing a skirt. The two get into a fight with a trucker and choose community service over a jail term.

programme.title: Nacho Libre
programme.desc: Brother Ignacio is an orphanage chef who cooks up a plan to earn money for the kids by becoming a Mexican wrestling star. First, he must don a leotard.

programme.title: Love Actually
programme.desc: Weaving in and out of the love lives of eight loosely inter-related couples. The bachelor Prime Minister falls for his personal assistant, his brother-in-law is flirting with one of his colleagues, a writer heads off to France and pursues an affair with a maid, and an 11-year-old boy asks his father for advice on matters of the heart.

programme.title: You, Me and Dupree
programme.desc: Carl is in seventh heaven when he marries his gorgeous girlfriend Molly in Hawaii. After a blissful honeymoon, they get back to find best man Dupree jobless, penniless and homeless. When Carl offers him a place to crash, he has no idea of the havoc that he is about to cause.

programme.title: Dumb and Dumber To
programme.desc: Twenty years after their last adventure, good-hearted, yet dimwitted best friends, Harry Dunne and Lloyd Christmas head out in search for Harry's long lost daughter, and Lloyd's in love again.

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2
programme.desc: Parenting and marriage is becoming tougher and tougher for Toula and her husband Ian. Not only has their relationship lost some of its spark, but they're also dealing with a rebellious teenage daughter who clashes with Greek traditions. On top of that, Toula must contend with aging parents and the endless needs of cousins and friends. When a shocking family secret comes to light, the entire Portokalos clan makes plans to come together for an even bigger wedding than before.

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: Video game experts are recruited by the military to fight 1980s-era video game characters who have attacked New York.

programme.title: The Blues Brothers
programme.desc: After his release from prison, Jake reunites with his brother, Elwood -- collectively known as the `Blues Brothers'. Jake's first task is to save the orphanage the brothers grew up in from closing, by raising 5000 dollars to pay back taxes. The two are convinced they can earn the money by getting their old band back together. However, after playing several gigs and making a few enemies, including the police, the brothers face daunting odds to deliver the money on time.

programme.title: Disaster Movie
programme.desc: Over the course of one evening, an unsuspecting group of twenty-somethings find themselves bombarded by a series of natural disasters and catastrophic events.

programme.title: Sixteen Candles
programme.desc: A teen suffers the pain of adolescence as she longs for Mr Right while fending off the advances of the class clown.

programme.title: Just Friends
programme.desc: An LA record producer returns to his New Jersey hometown ten years after being rejected by his high-school cheerleader crush. Having made the transformation from no-hope geek to Greek god womaniser and with his friend still single, he embarks on a second seduction strategy that does not always go to plan.

programme.title: Alfie
programme.desc: In an update of the 1966 Lewis Gilbert version, the eponymous Alfie is transposed to Manhattan and working as a chauffeur. His conquests include older woman Liz, lonely Nikki and Lonette, his best friend's girl. However, he begins to learn bitter truths about himself and the way he treats women and, by the end of the film, he discovers a degree of humility.

programme.title: Mr. Deeds

programme.desc: After losing his position as a minor-league pitcher, Montgomery Brewster learns his great-uncle has left him 300 million dollars. To inherit it, Brewster must spend 30 million in 30 days under a complicated set of rules that forbid him from donating too much to charity or retaining any new assets when the period is up. Unable to share details about the will's odd conditions with anyone, Brewster sets out to spend his money under the stern eye of paralegal Angela Drake.
