programme.title: WILD WIND
programme.desc: An allied commando unit is created to destroy a train loaded with Nazi soldiers during World War Two

programme.title: Danger Close: The Battle Of Long Tan
programme.desc: (2019) War drama with Travis Fimmel. Outnumbered and outgunned, a band of 108 inexperienced Australian and New Zealand soldiers hold off 2,500 enemy troops during a downpour in Vietnam.

programme.title: Saints and Soldiers
programme.desc: (2003) War drama with Corbin Allred. After a Nazi ambush leaves them trapped behind enemy lines, a small band of soldiers discover a secret that could change the war - if they can make it out alive...

programme.title: Alone We Fight
programme.desc: A small band of American solders in World War Two venture behind enemy lines to try and stop the German advance from breaking through the Allied lines. Starring Corbin Bernsen (2018)

programme.title: HELL RIVER
programme.desc: Yugoslavian freedom fighters clash with the Nazis that invaded their homeland.

programme.title: Triple Cross
programme.desc: (1967) WWII spy thriller with Christopher Plummer. Loosely based on a true story, bank robber Eddie Chapman gets entangled in spying for both sides during World War Two, becoming a triple agent.

programme.title: Garage Sale Mystery: The Wedding Dress
programme.desc: (2015) Murder mystery with Lori Loughlin. When she finds a bloodstained wedding dress with a strange backstory, second-hand sleuth Jennifer must lift the veil on a decades-old crime.

programme.title: Garage Sale Mysteries: Guilty Until Proven Innocent
programme.desc: (2016) Quirky detective drama with Lori Loughlin. An antiques expert with a knack for sleuthing investigates a murder case when her friend is accused of killing her fiancé.

programme.title: Lost Letter Mysteries: Second Chances
programme.desc: (2013) Cosy drama with Eric Mabius and Kristin Booth. The postal detectives are faced with the chance to redeem a wrongfully accused man and to reunite him with his lost love.

programme.title: What The Nanny Saw
programme.desc: (2021) Thriller with Revell Carpenter. When nanny Kimberly uncovers her employer's affair with a lady who later turns up dead, she dives into the couple's dark secrets, fearing she might be next.

programme.title: Nightmare Neighbourhood Moms
programme.desc: (2021) Thriller starring Gina Simms. After a neighbour is killed in a botched robbery, a woman launches a neighbourhood watch - only to uncover secrets far more dangerous than she expected.

programme.title: Love Off the Page
programme.desc: (2022) Rom-com starring Malone Thomas. A hopeless romantic buys a book from a mysterious store, only to find its stories unfolding in real life. Will it depict her own love story?

programme.title: Sister Dating Swap
programme.desc: (2023) Romantic comedy starring Lauren Collins. Two sisters swap homes for two weeks to escape their routines, only to find that love and self-discovery are just a change of address away.​

programme.title: Written in The Stars
programme.desc: (2021) Romance with Kimberley Crossman. A journalist teams up with an astrology guru to write about a local meteor shower festival - but will love also be written in the stars?

programme.title: Eat, Drink and Be Married
programme.desc: (2019) Romance starring Jocelyn Hudon. Wedding planner Billie is hired to save a couple's relationship. Will falling for the groom's brother rewrite the itinerary?

programme.title: Lead With Your Heart
programme.desc: (2015) Drama starring William Baldwin. When their parents' marriage hits the rocks, two teenagers team up to hatch a daring plan to keep the family together.

programme.title: The 27-Hour Day
programme.desc: (2021) Romantic comedy starring Autumn Reeser. A workaholic wellness mogul goes on a retreat in Montana, where she discovers that slowing down might just be the key to finding inner peace - and love.

programme.title: Matching Hearts
programme.desc: (2020) Romance starring Taylor Cole. A professional matchmaker is tasked with matchmaking a perpetually single man to boost her company's profile. Could the perfect match be right in front of them?

programme.title: Hometown Hero
programme.desc: (2017) Pooch-perfect romance starring Brooke Nevin. A young divorce mediator is cynical about love. Until a client's four-legged friend introduces her to the local vet...

programme.title: Meet Me in New York
programme.desc: (2021) Rom-com starring Brooke Nevin. An ambitious New York events planner butts heads with her client: a stubborn but influential website editor. Have they met their match in one another?

programme.title: Cabin Connection
programme.desc: (2022) Romance starring Katherine Barrell. When a committed bachelorette hires a widowed handyman to fix up her late grandmother's cabin, will her faith in love also be restored?

programme.title: Eat, Drink and Be Married
programme.desc: (2019) Romance starring Jocelyn Hudon. Wedding planner Billie is hired to save a couple's relationship. Will falling for the groom's brother rewrite the itinerary?

programme.desc: Martin and Lucy visit a house in Congleton in Cheshire, a one-bedroom flat in Willesden in London and a former ambulance station in Port Talbot in Wales.

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer
programme.desc: An enormous semi in Rotherham, an impressive former chapel in Fraddon in Cornwall and a tiny terraced house in Putney in London go under the hammer. But which one could command a price tag of well over a million pounds after it has been spruced up?

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer
programme.desc: Lucy looks at a one-bedroom flat next to a train line in London with a hefty guide price. Martin visits projects in Abertillary and Walderslade.

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: Mum has bought curtain material for the soon to be newly decorated kitchen, and asks Dad to look after it while she is out. However, Dad falls asleep and mistakenly agrees that Dennis can use it as a giant sail. When Dad realises that it has gone, he calls Dennis to bring it back, but unfortunately Dennis gets into a spot of bother with the colonel, who takes the curtain material off Dennis. In an attempt to steal it back, the garden being wrecked and the kitchen is left looking like a bombsite. Dennis, Gnasher and Dad have to clean up the whole kitchen and redecorate it in time for Mum returning. When Mum decides it is time to hang the new curtains, Dennis is about to get the curtain material, but Mum reveals that she has changed her mind and bought new curtains instead. Followed by 'Fangs for the Memories'

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: Dennis, his friends and Walter's friends get marooned on a desert island when Dennis attempts to escape a boring field trip. Followed by Substitute Creecher

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: Dennis plays a prank on the citizens of Beanotown, causing them to evacuate, which causes trouble for Dennis later. Followed by 'No Place Like Home'

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: Gnasher and Gnipper enter a dog show, regardless of Walter saying they don't have true talent. He wants Athena and Miss Mini Wuff to win, but Walter has just underestimated Gnasher's true capabilities. Followed by Grounded.

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: Double Act Gnasher and Gnipper enter a dog show, regardless of Walter saying they don't have true talent. He wants Athena and Miss Mini Wuff to win, but Walter has just underestimated Gnasher's true capabilities. Followed by Grounded.

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: The In Crowd Athena gets Gnasher envy when seeing a pampered version of Gnasher in a magazine and when she hears that Dennis owns an Abyssinian wire-haired tripe hound (Gnasher), she wants him. However, being an owner to Gnasher isn't all cracked up to be! Followed by 'Splash'

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: Dennis Hiccups Dennis gets a case of the hiccups from Mr. Har Har's can-o-giggles and is looking for a way to cure them ready for a film premier. Followed by Athena's Party

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: Beanotown in Bloom The garden is accidentaly wrecked when Dennis tries to give Gnasher a bath, so the gang have to fix the mess before Mum comes home. Followed by 'Run Rabbit Run'

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: You're Joking Dennis makes a line of practical jokes for Mr. Scrimp, called 'The Menace Collection.' However, Dennis soon learns that it will put Mr. Har Har out of business.

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: The Way of Den-Do After Walter takes up origami as a martial art, Dennis scoffs and comes up with his own martial art, and so the two prepare to battle it out. Followed by 'Smelling of Roses'

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: Aliens Among Us After watching a film about an alien invasion, Dennis, Curly and Pie Face decide to make their own film. However, Walter stumbles across them filming, and he only sees the action, not the camera. Filming what he sees on his mobile phone, he runs to tell the whole of Beanotown about the alien invasion. As panic spreads, Dennis and his friends discover the chaos and decide to keep filming in order to help make the best of their own alien film. Meanwhile, Sergeant Slipper investigates the alien landing that Walter has seen, and discovers the truth—that the spaceship is a playhouse with glow sticks in it. Followed by 'Castle in the Air'

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: Great Outdoors Dennis and his pet dog, Gnasher, live by just one rule: Kids should make all the rules! Followed by Dance of the Seven Pies.

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: Game On To get his friends back from Walter's group, Dennis challenges Walter to a videogames battle. Followed by 'Fish Tale'.

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: Attack of the Walterbot For a school project, Dennis and Walter both build robots. However, during an accident, both robots merge, causing Dennis and Walter to defend the school. Followed by 'No Joke.'

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: Dennis V.I.P With one backstage pass for a Ratbucket gig, Dennis and his friends pass themselves off as Ratbucket, only for the real Ratbucket not to be able to play at his own concert. Followed by 60 second Dennis and 'Bad Dad'

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: Rubber Bands and Paperclips After Dennis breaks his bike, Dad is unable to afford a new one, so Dennis convinces him to ask his boss for a raise. Unfortunately, Mr Scrimp reduces his wages instead. Dennis then trashes his house to convince Scrimp that his family are poor, so that Mr Scrimp will feel compelled to raise Dad's wages. Just as Scrimp has been taken in by Dennis' plan, Mum and Dad arrive home laden with shopping bags, resulting in Dad getting fired on the spot. Dennis resolves to get Dad his old job back by secretly causing chaos at his office. To restore order Scrimp rehires Dad, sealing the deal with a generous pay rise. Mum and Dad repair the house, but still don't have enough money to buy Dennis a new bike, instead it gets repaired with Dad's office rubber bands and paperclips. Followed by 60 Second Dennis and 'Dennis Hiccups'.

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: Breakout Believing Gnasher and Gnipper to be trapped in Beanotown Dog Pound, Dennis comes up with a plan to rescue his friends and bring them both home. Followed by more Dennis and Gnasher episodes.

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: Eyes on the Prize When Dennis breaks his skateboard again, Dad agrees to buy Dennis the best skateboard there is as a replacement if he is able to win a prize at the upcoming school award ceremony. Followed by 60 Second Dennis and 'Dance of the Seven Pies'

programme.desc: Dennis tries to get a birthday present by saying thank you to his relatives. However, because of Dennis' naughty personality, they take his attempts in a negative way. Followed by 'Dennis Hiccups'

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: To get his friends back from Walter's group, Dennis challenges Walter to a videogames battle. Followed by 60 Second Dennis and 'Masters of the House'.

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: After a wrestling accident, Gnasher swallows a canister of laughing gas at the vet's. Dennis, along with Gnasher hide in the conference centre, where dad gives a speech. However, the canister leaks, causing Gnasher to fart laughing gas and having everyone laughing. Followed by 'Attack of the Walterbot'

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: Dennis and Co. have to control Pie Face's obsession with pies during the Pie Festival. Otherwise, they will be grounded. Followed by 'Great Outdoors'

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: On a school trip, Dennis finds out that he is descentant to a warrior tribe. He also discovers that Montanna Smith (a famous Indiana Jones-esque explorer and one of Walter's personal heroes) is actually a thief who's trying to steal the treasure of Dennis' ancestor. Will he be stopped before he gets his hands on the treasure? Followed by Dog Tired.

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: To get his friends back from Walter's group, Dennis challenges Walter to a videogames battle. Followed by 60 Second Dennis and 'Masters of the House'.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Littlest Viking: The Smurfs take Grandpa Smurf to the King's castle so that he can meet Peewit. But what with one thing and another (especially another), the Smurfs and Peewit are taken aboard a Viking long ship. The Vikings take Peewit to be their mythical Great Warrior, the one who is going to vanquish the Storm King. Can the Smurfs help Peewit out of his quandary?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Sir Hefty: Sir Hefty discovers a wayward knight to help him defeat a dragon whose fire is threatening to destroy the forest. Alas, the knight proves to be a coward, leaving Hefty to prove just how brave he is when he sends the dragon away from Smurf Village.

programme.title: To Smurf A Thief
programme.desc: The Smurfs and Homnibus befriend an unfortunate boy who is forced to steal for his master. Soon, the evil thief is turned over to the magistrate and the boy is happy to live with Homnibus.

programme.title: Skyscraper Smurfs
programme.desc: Sure, a village of mushroom-shaped houses is nice and jolly... But not very modern, in Architect Smurf's view. What the Smurfs need is smurfdominium, a new, daring concept that will change the art of living forever...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Tick Tock Smurfs: The village of the Smurfs used to live without a clock. But now suddenly time becomes a precious commodity and Brainy Smurf designs a schedule to take advantage of the new Village clock... Can the Smurfs survive the attacks of time?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - No Smurf Is An Island: Handy Smurf is the one who fixes everything that needs mending in the Village of the Smurfs. But are his efforts really appreciated by the other Smurfs? Not at all. At least this is what Handy feels when he resolves to leave the Smurfs Village forever and live in the sea with Marina the Mermaid...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Smurfing For Gold: Gargamel the evil wizard is in trouble again. If he can't find an enormous amount of gold by sundown, all his possessions will be taken away from him. But the Smurfs are going to help their arch-enemy... Up to a point.

programme.title: Scruple's Sweetheart
programme.desc: Brenda, the little witch, feels rejected: no-one is taking her to this year's Broomstick Ball. Oh, if she could find some nice-looking boy... Then she meets Scruple, apprentice of the evil wizard Gargamel. He's so handsome, and available too! What she does not know is that Scruple's only interest is her magic wand. What the Smurfs know is that they're going to save the day.

programme.title: All Work And No Smurf
programme.desc: The Smurfs misinterpret Papa's order to devote a workday to the Smurflings. Instead of taking the day off, they work harder than ever and contract "work-a-tosis". The only cure for this illness is to take their minds off work, which they do by rescuing the Smurflings from the Water Harpies.

programme.title: Symbols Of Wisdom
programme.desc: Brainy Smurf desperately wants to be more like Papa Smurf. Can a hair tonic be the answer? Can Gargamel be able to finally capture the Smurfs? Does wisdom really reside in a beard?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Marco Smurf And The Pepper Pirates: The Smurfs sail off in their sailing boat to save Marco Smurf, who has been captured at sea by Captain Pepper. Marina and a dolphin help to free Marco.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Little Orange Horse With Gold Shoes: Sliding down a rainbow, a little winged horse loses a golden shoe. He meets the Smurfette and she helps him look for his lost horseshoe. They fall in love somehow, for who could be unmoved by the charm of a little orange horse... Or of a Smurfette?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Handy's Sweetheart: Handy learns it's better to have smurfed than not to have smurfed at all when he learns his true love is really a mermaid. Can they really live with each other forever?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Put Upon Puppy: Life in the Smurf Village might be more peaceful if Puppy's behavior were a little more considerate. But the little Smurf dog is digging up Smurfette's flowers, dirtying Vanity's new wallpaper or ruining Papa Smurf's experiments. Yet Puppy's going to help the Smurfs out of a trap contrived by Gargamel... Or maybe he won't be disciplined enough...

programme.title: The Magic Stick
programme.desc: With a borrowed recipe from Homnibus, Papa Smurf creates a magic stick that Clumsy takes and loses in the woods. Soon after, Bigmouth comes for a visit and before he eats all the smurfberries, Papa Smurf finds the magic stick and whisks the giant away.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Smurf Who Would Be King: Dreamy yearns to be King after reading a story about them. He falls through a whirlpool while on his ship and finds himself in the land of pokies who think Dreamy is their long-lost King. When he confronts the pokies' enemies, the Norfnags, he finds they aren't fearful at all. Dreamy bumps his head and wakes up to discover it was just a dream, yet finds a jewel in his cap, just like the ones the pokies mine for a living.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Most Unsmurfy Games: To prove the worth of his Big Book of Wilderness Survival, Brainy takes the Smurflings to the swamp. Where, thanks to his expert advice, the tiny group gets totally lost, is then caught in quicklime and trapped by King Bullrush of the Wartmongers. Fortunately, Bullrush is in a playful mood and devises a Smurf hunt. Unfortunately, Brainy believes he is a born leader...

programme.title: Revenge Of The Smurfs
programme.desc: A war is raging in the Middle Ages. Knights in armor in hot pursuit inadvertently destroy the Smurfs Village so a small band of Smurfs decide to avenge this wrongdoing. Won't Papa Smurf think this is too human-like a reaction?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Littlest Giant: Simon is lost in the forest and in search of his parents. Simon is the son of a couple of giants. The Smurfs try to bring him home, but then Gargamel interrupts the party.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Lost City Of Yore: Curiosity brings Nosey Smurf to the lair of the Hag Sisters, who want to find the terrifying Sceptre of Yore... And Gargamel wants to cheat the two witches as he tries to destroy the Smurfs.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Adventures Of Robin Smurf: The Smurfs' theatrical production of 'Robin Smurf' comes to life as the legendary hero is portrayed by a really good actor...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Smurfette For A Day: Hefty dresses like Smurfette to lure an enamored gnome, Piltkin, away from the Smurf Village. They burrow underground and meet a female gnome who falls in love with Piltkin who then casts Smurfette aside for his new heartthrob.

programme.title: Queen Smurfette
programme.desc: Smurfette becomes Queen for a day on her birthday. But this gets out of hand when Father Time falls asleep, neglecting to end the days. Tempers begin to flare among the Smurfs, who are tired of servitude. Papa rushes to wake Father Time and brings peace again to Smurfland.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - April Smurf's Day: April Smurf's Day turns out to be not so funny when Gargamel dons a smurfberry bush disguise to capture the happy little Smurfs. Papa Smurf instructs Feathers to call the birds to attack the fake bush. After it is stripped, the captured Smurfs climb aboard Feathers and fly away.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Waste Not, Smurf Not: Growing, harvesting and preparing food takes up much of the Smurfs' time. Handy invents a machine that farms and processes food. But this wonderful invention has its drawbacks...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Tis The Season To Be Smurfy: This is Wild Smurf's first Christmas, and he's impressed by the decorations in the Village of the Smurfs. But Grandpa and Sassette are going to teach him the real meaning of Christmas when they help an old couple to live the most beautiful Christmas they've ever seen...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Prince And The Hopper: What is that strange talking frog that Morlock the Wizard sends all of Prince Theodore's soldiers to catch? Is it a demon frog, as he says, or something else? Truth will out when Smurfette and the Smurflings meet the frog. They help to change this frog back into Prince Theodore himself, for he's been the victim of a spell cast by Morlock.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - All's Smurfy That Ends Smurfy: Gargamel's theft of the Fairies' gold almost brings a state of war between the Fairies and the Smurfs.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - A Pet For Baby Smurf: There is a prize for the cutest pet of a Smurf. Baby Smurf brings a cute, lovely, affectionate Glowing Darling, a pet anybody falls in love with… But this pet is a creation of Gargamel, the evil wizard intent on destroying the Smurfs!

programme.title: The Purple Smurfs
programme.desc: The purple fly bites Lazy and an epidemic starts that turns the little villagers into angry, purple Smurfs. Papa Smurf discovers that the pollen from a tuberose flower is an antidote and soon things are smurfy again.

programme.title: The Answer Smurf
programme.desc: Nobody ever listens to Brainy Smurf's advice, and when Papa Smurf is away and Brainy feels he's in charge, he decides he's going to be the one with all the answers. There is a magic formula in Papa Smurf's Book of Spells that ensures everyone in the Village of the Smurfs is going to ask for Brain's opinion. As if matters weren't difficult enough, here's Gargamel...

programme.title: Hefty And The Wheelsmurfer
programme.desc: Hefty Smurf learns what is to be handicapped when he breaks his leg. Handy Smurf creates the wheelsmurfer for him, a contraption that will give Hefty some mobility. But suddenly the evil wizard Gargamel appears on the scene.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Bubble, Bubble, Smurfs In Trouble: Each morning, dew is deposited by water sprites on forest leaves. Wait till you see what happens when Scaredy Smurf gets hold of the dew-making magic wand...

programme.title: He Who Smurfs Last
programme.desc: Jokey's practical jokes go too far when Chlorhydris is the victim of one. She gets her revenge on the Smurfs by creating a spell to steal their sense of humor. Grouchy, who had no sense of humor to begin with, breaks the spell by getting back the humor potion.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Fake Smurf: Hogatha turns herself into a Smurf, plotting revenge on the little people for destroying her magic locket. Papa Smurf outwits her and banishes her from the forest once more.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Jokey's Shadow: Accidents do happen. This time it is Jokey Smurf's mistake that ends up with his shadow coming to independent life! And the shadow loves to play practical jokes on the whole population of the Village of the Smurfs...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Smurfs' Time Capsule: As the Smurfs busily build a time capsule for all of their talents, Papa Smurf frantically tries to unravel an ancient Druid riddle before disaster strikes the forest.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Last Smurfberry: Papa Smurf organizes a crew to sail to Smurfberry Island because Gargamel has killed all of the trees except one to trap the Smurfs. Gargamel follows them, but once more fails to catch them because the Witch of Smurfberry Island sends her nose-eating seagulls after them.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Comet Is Coming!: Papa's note to the Smurfs about viewing a comet is delivered torn. The Smurfs read only the first part and think their world is coming to an end. They plan how to spend their last day until Papa returns to clear up the misunderstanding and assure them that they are safe.

programme.title: Monster Smurfs
programme.desc: This is spook-a-Smurf eve, and all the Smurfs get ready for the fancy dress party… But Brainy Smurf gets hold of Papa Smurf's Book of Magic, and all the Smurfs are changed into hideous but funny creatures. Yet danger lurks...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Put Upon Puppy: Life in the Smurf Village might be more peaceful if Puppy's behavior were a little more considerate. But the little Smurf dog is digging up Smurfette's flowers, dirtying Vanity's new wallpaper or ruining Papa Smurf's experiments. Yet Puppy's going to help the Smurfs out of a trap contrived by Gargamel... Or maybe he won't be disciplined enough...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - One Good Smurf Deserves Another: Handy Smurf has saved Clumsy from a horrible fate. Clumsy swears eternal devotion to his savior and does his best to repay his debt… With awkward results. A clever scheme is needed to stop Clumsy's well-meant catastrophes...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Most Popular Smurf: Jokey's surprise exploding packages have been changed by a spell. Picture the practical joker's discombobulating when he realises that all the surprises that he hands to unsuspecting Smurfs contain nothing but real gifts! No more ka-boom, no more jokes, no more fun! Plus the unenviable new position of Most Popular Smurf in the Village, surrounded by admirers begging for more presents...

programme.title: The Kaplowey Scroll
programme.desc: There is a terrifying magic word. When you direct the word at something or someone, you make it vanish into nothingness! Can the Smurfs undo its evil power before Gargamel gets hold of it?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Papa Smurf, Papa Smurf: Yes, there can be too much of a good thing. When an accident happens to Papa Smurf's magic formula and he ends up multiplied by two, the Smurfs are elated: two Papa Smurfs can give twice the good counsel and twice the loving that one can. But after a while, things get too complex in the Village. Especially when another accident doubles the number of Gargamels!

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Smurfs At Sea: Papa Smurf recalls Dreamy's exciting voyage on the high seas and his gripping adventures with sea turtles, whales, desert islands... and pirates!

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - A Mere Truffle: The Smurfs love truffles but truffles belong to the Trolls and the Trolls live under Truffle Troll Mountain, where in the shadows of the lake lurks the Thing with No Name...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - It's A Puppy's Life: The evil wizard Gargamel has got hold of magical ectoplasmic crystal eggs that will enable him to change bodies with Papa Smurf. What better plan could there be? Disguised as Papa Smurf, he's going to lead all the Smurfs to his cauldron! But as fate would have it, Gargamel is changed into Puppy, the Smurf doggie...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - A Hug For Grouchy: Grouchy learns that emotions can be great, particularly after the villainess of Chlorhydris creates a heart of ice to magically drain every one of care and love.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Clumsy Smurfs The Future: What a strange stone Clumsy has unearthed! In it, he can see events that are going to happen... Yet knowing part of the future sometimes brings bad luck!

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Unsound Smurf: In an effort to give Papa some quiet time, Brainy uses one of Papa's spells to create a magical sound barrier around the village. Papa cannot reverse the spell and sends the Smurflings, who are trapped outside the Village, to a noisemaker. Baby takes a bottle of sound from the noisemaker, which breaks the barrier.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Sideshow Smurfs: Clumsy and Smurfette are captured by the wicked Bombast, who plans to exhibit them in his sideshow. Papa Smurf hurries to their rescue and using the bungling Gargamel for interference is able to rescue his Smurfs.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - A Clockwork Smurf: Handy has built a very complex Smurf machine that does everything. It proves dangerous when it nearly destroys the village, but comes in useful when, with the help of the other Smurfs, it saves the young prince Gerard's kingdom from the queen aunt Imperia's dastardly intentions.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Once In A Blue Moon: Once in a blue moon, as the legend goes, a baby Smurf is delivered to the Smurfs and everyone in the village becomes attached to the new arrival. But a mistake has been made and the stork returns to take the baby back. Grouchy and Smurfette have become so attached to the baby that the baby is returned.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Supersmurf: Bigmouth steals the Smurfs' winter food supply and Brainy concocts one of Papa Smurf's magic strength potions so he can fight the greedy giant. The super formula wears off, but Papa Smurf works a fast switch, replacing the food with rocks and Bigmouth is none the wiser.

programme.title: The Abominable Snowbeast
programme.desc: Brainy and his friends organize a journey to Ice Mountain to pick the rare snow flower for Papa Smurf. They meet a terrifying snow beast that befriends them, due to Smurfette's kindness, and helps them find the tiny flower.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Papa's Puppy Prescription: Gargamel conjures a spell that makes Puppy think he's a cat. Papa receives a prescription from Homnibus to reverse the spell and all the Smurfs help. As Puppy becomes a dog again, Gargamel gets too close and he becomes a cat.

programme.title: Farmer's Genie
programme.desc: As Farmer Smurf says, what's a gourd doing in the melon patch, when it should be by the rutabagas? But when Farmer Smurf pulls the gourd out of the ground he frees a genie, which calls him Master and insists on granting him wishes. The genie, called Gourdy, is going to be more of a hindrance than a help in his eagerness to please Farmer Smurf.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Haunted Smurf: The Smurfs' winter food supply is destroyed and they journey to a distant castle in search of shelter. Initially, they think the castle is haunted, but after they solve the mystery of a greedy pack of rats, the grateful owner presents them with an abundance of food for their long winter.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Journey To The Centre Of The Smurf: Winter is setting in on the Village of the Smurfs. The little Smurfs are freezing. But what is Clumsy doing with this strange rock he's discovered? And why is Miner Smurf so enthusiastic about their new discovery? Surely, one more addition to Clumsy's rock collection is not worth all this hoopla... The Smurfs will discover danger and surprises when they go underground.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Grouchy Makes A Splash: We all know Grouchy Smurf hates a lot of things. But one thing he hates more than anything else is water, when there is enough of it to drown in. You see, Grouchy can't swim. And when the Smurfs notice this peculiarity and try to teach him how to survive in water, the evil wizard Gargamel makes things a little more dangerous than they ought to be....

programme.title: Clumsy Luck
programme.desc: The Smurfs learn about superstition when Clumsy breaks Vanity's mirror prior to a meteor shower. When a meteor falls on Clumsy's house, everyone attributes it to bad luck, but realize the foolishness of this philosophy when they see Clumsy was not in the house at the time.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Royal Drum: No one believes Grandpa Smurf when he tells of far-away jungles and savannahs teeming with wild giant cats, striped horses, long-necked leaf-eaters and strange tribes... Only some Smurflings give some credit to his tales. But when Grandpa Smurf hears the sound of the magic Royal Drum in the forest, the one that can tame wild beasts, he sets out to prove that he's not an old addle-brained storyteller.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Never Smurf Off Till Tomorrow: A fierce wind carries the Smurfs' windmill away, with several Smurfs inside. Is Lazy Smurf really at fault or is an injustice being committed? Are the captive Smurfs going to be saved from the volcano's crater? Is Brainy going to smurf up his mouth for a moment?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - All Hallowseve: While out on a mischief-making mission to destroy the Smurfs' Happy Halloween party, Gargamel and Hogatha catch Lazy who has been accidentally turned red by Mother Nature. Papa and the Smurfs help Lazy escape while Mother Nature has Father Time help turn Lazy's red into blue just in time for the Halloween party.

programme.title: It Came From Outer Smurf
programme.desc: Dreamy wants to encounter beings from outer space so much that no one believes him when he talks of having met one. Yet the arrival of this extraterrestrial is going to wreak havoc in the Smurf Village...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Smurf Who Would Be King: Dreamy yearns to be King after reading a story about them. He falls through a whirlpool while on his ship and finds himself in the land of pokies who think Dreamy is their long-lost King. When he confronts the pokies' enemies, the Norfnags, he finds they aren't fearful at all. Dreamy bumps his head and wakes up to discover it was just a dream, yet finds a jewel in his cap, just like the ones the pokies mine for a living.

programme.title: All Creatures Great And Smurf
programme.desc: Nat Smurf is convinced he can help all creatures with his healing ways, even the wicked Azrael after he gets his paw caught in a trap. He heals well, but even though he is tempted to stay with the Smurfs, he runs back to Gargamel while leading his old master away from Smurf Village.

programme.title: Don Smurfo
programme.desc: Everyone has their own dreams. That of Smurfette is to meet the legendary Don Smurfo, the dashing, witty, swashbuckling hero of many an engrossing tale. The Smurfs shrug at this infatuation. But when a real-life Don Smurfo appears in the village and Smurfette snubs them all in favor of the bragging stranger, they take the matter a little more seriously.

programme.title: Handy's Window-Vision
programme.desc: Miner Smurf leaves no stone unturned and this is how he discovers a crystal that transmits images. Thus Handy is able to invent window-vision and, every morning from then on, the Smurfs are able to watch Hefty's workouts, Farmer Smurf's crop reports or even the Brainy Smurf Hour. But would you believe it? The evil wizard Gargamel takes advantage of this image-watching to catch Smurfs!

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Smurfs' Time Capsule: As the Smurfs busily build a time capsule for all of their talents, Papa Smurf frantically tries to unravel an ancient Druid riddle before disaster strikes the forest.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - A Mere Truffle: The Smurfs love truffles but truffles belong to the Trolls and the Trolls live under Truffle Troll Mountain, where in the shadows of the lake lurks the Thing with No Name...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Poet And Painter: Because they feel unappreciated, Poet and Painter leave Smurf Village and head for Storm Island, totally unaware that Gargamel is planning to trap them. Papa Smurf and his faithful volunteers rescue their friends.

programme.title: Hefty And The Wheelsmurfer
programme.desc: Hefty Smurf learns what is to be handicapped when he breaks his leg. Handy Smurf creates the wheelsmurfer for him, a contraption that will give Hefty some mobility. But suddenly the evil wizard Gargamel appears on the scene.

programme.title: Ultimate Gunfighter
programme.desc: Two family clans have always been enemies they spend their time hating and killing each other. The daughter of the Campos family and the son of the Mounter family fall in love, thus causing further hatred and deaths.

programme.title: The Southerner
programme.desc: The life of the poor Tucker family, that worked as cotton pluggers and decided to get their own ground, but nature is against them.

programme.title: Bonanza Compilation Episodes 48, 49
programme.desc: The Wild West adventures of Ben Cartwright and his sons as they run and defend their Nevada ranch while helping the surrounding community.

programme.title: No Killing Without Dollars
programme.desc: Lawrence White returns to Owell Rock seeking revenge for his father's murder. To protect his identity and strategy, he adopts a new name and hires another man to impersonate Lawrence White, setting a dangerous game of deception and vengeance in motion.

programme.title: Secret of Captain O'Hara
programme.desc: Captain O'Hara saves Mary from Navajo warriors and brings her safely to Fort San Antonio. But her fiancé, Major Brooks, is not only O'Hara's rival but also a ruthless enemy of the Native tribes. As tensions rise, O'Hara must fight for peace while facing personal betrayal and growing conflict.

programme.title: The Plunderers
programme.desc: Cavalry officer John Drum attempts to track down outlaw Whit Lacey, but finds he must join forces with Lacey to fight a Sioux war party.

programme.title: Renegade Girl
programme.desc: Ann Shelby, whose family is allied with the notorious William Quantrill, turns outlaw to revenge herself on a renegade Indian who killed her brother.

programme.title: Two Crosses at Danger Pass
programme.desc: Judy and Alex are the only two survivors of a punitive mission ordered by the rich and ruthless Moran.... The girl becomes his maid and the boy is adopted by a Quaker family. Alex, despite the philosophy of forgiveness he has been taught, plans to take revenge.

programme.title: Mackenzie's Raiders EP17-20
programme.desc: Colonel Mackenzie, commander of the 4th Cavalry Regiment at Fort Clark near Brackettville in Kinney County in southwest Texas during the 1870s, receives secret orders from President Ulysses S. Grant and Secretary of War William W. Belknap to stop bandits from crossing the Rio Grande into the United States, or from returning to Mexico.

programme.title: Mackenzie's Raiders EP21-24
programme.desc: Colonel Mackenzie, commander of the 4th Cavalry Regiment at Fort Clark near Brackettville in Kinney County in southwest Texas during the 1870s, receives secret orders from President Ulysses S. Grant and Secretary of War William W. Belknap to stop bandits from crossing the Rio Grande into the United States, or from returning to Mexico.

programme.title: Heads or Tails
programme.desc: Shanda is charged with the murder of the banker, Burton and to save her from being lynched, the sheriff sends her off to Phoenix. During the trip the two deputies to whom she's been entrusted rape and leave her in the desert, certain that she's dead. The girl is found by Black Talisman, an outlaw, who takes her to his hideout, nurses her back to health and after hearing her story, determines to avenge her and clear her name.

programme.title: The Great Treasure Hunt
programme.desc: A blind man wants to get his mitts on a crooks' gold. He can't do it alone, so he hires the quartet of soldiers-of-fortune to help him.

programme.title: Patience Has a Limit, We Don't
programme.desc: During the Civil War, Corporal MacDonald hides a large gold shipment meant for the Union. Before he can retrieve it, he's killed—taking the secret location with him. Now, a Union lieutenant and MacDonald's two sons compete to uncover the buried treasure in a tense hunt filled with danger and deception.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The third visit of the week is to The Crown at Whitchurch in Herefordshire, where ex-army man Tom Jones runs the pub B&B with his step-daughter Samara Cohen. Initial impressions are good as Martin and Hannah struggle to find fault and Clare and Fran feel like queens. But, still smarting following their feedback, Rob and Michelle have a fair few gripes. During an afternoon racing an army-style assault course the competitiveness within the group is clear.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The final visit is to The New Court Hotel in Usk, where manager Clare Davies is joined in the competition by the pub owner's mother, Fran Hancock. On arrival, Tom and Samara are impressed, but Martin and Hannah find lots of cleanliness issues. At dinner, there are tensions as the group discuss who would take which role if they were to run a B&B together. Breakfast is cooked by Clare, but peppery eggs and missing mushrooms cause concern.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: It's the final day of the competition, and the B&B owners meet to find out what they've been paid and to settle some scores after being offended by some of the feedback they've received. There are arguments, tensions, drama and intrigue as they all discover their payments before the winner is revealed.

He slowly falls in love with her and her baby, but she's still looking for the perfect partner, not realising he's right under her nose. However we can hear the baby's thoughts, and he wants the guy as his dad.

programme.title: Snow White & the Huntsman
programme.desc: In a twist to the fairy tale, the Huntsman ordered to take Snow White into the woods to be killed winds up becoming her protector and mentor in a quest to vanquish the Evil Queen.

programme.title: Look Who's Talking Too
programme.desc: A wisecracking toddler deals with toilet training, bickering parents and a baby sister in this sequel to the 1989 hit.

programme.title: The Adventures of Sharkboy and Lavagirl
programme.desc: Dreamer Max, ridiculed by his classmates, conjures up his perfect dreamworld - the Planet Drool, but his dream is more powerful than even he suspects, and his favourite dream superheroes, Sharkboy and Lavagirl, materialise on Earth. They bring news that an alien intelligence is threatening his beloved Planet Drool. Is it true, as Sharkboy and Lavagirl say, that only Max can stop it?

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: Live-action version of the classic stone-age cartoon series. Fred Flintstone donates his family savings to help neighbour Barney Rubble and wife Betty adopt a child, much to the dismay of mother-in-law Pearl. To return the favour, Barney swaps slabs with Fred in an aptitude test, resulting in Fred's being promoted and becoming involved in an embezzlement plot, while Barney is left in the dole queue.

programme.title: Friend or Foe
programme.desc: In wartime Britain, one of two boys looking for a crashed Nazi German aeroplane needs to be rescued from drowning by its pilot, leading them to wonder what the right thing to do is.

programme.title: Finding Neverland
programme.desc: After his latest play flops, JM Barrie finds distraction when he befriends the Llewelyn Davies family, four young boys and their widowed mother Sylvia. His relationship with them threatens his marriage and standing in society, but results in the creation of `Peter Pan'.

programme.title: Big Fat Liar
programme.desc: Fibs, pranks and manoeuvres take centre stage amid a 14-year-old habitual liar's bizarre confrontation with an obnoxious filmmaker who is in dire need of a blockbuster.

programme.title: Ghostbusters: Frozen Empire
programme.desc: The Spenglers return to the New York City firehouse where the original Ghostbusters have taken ghost-busting to the next level. When the discovery of an ancient artefact unleashes an evil force, Ghostbusters new and old must unite to save the world.

programme.title: Look Who's Talking Too
programme.desc: A wisecracking toddler deals with toilet training, bickering parents and a baby sister in this sequel to the 1989 hit.

programme.title: The Huntsman: Winter's War
programme.desc: Betrayed by her evil sister Ravenna, heartbroken Freya retreats to a northern kingdom to raise an army of huntsmen as her protectors. Gifted with the ability to freeze her enemies in ice, Freya teaches her young soldiers to never fall in love. When Eric and fellow warrior Sara defy this rule, the angry queen does whatever she can to stop them. As war between the siblings escalates, Eric and Sara try to end Ravenna's wicked reign.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Out of the Shadows
programme.desc: The turtles face a new challenge when Shredder escapes from custody and joins forces with Baxter Stockman, a mad scientist who plans to use a serum to take over the world. Along for the ride are Bebop and Rocksteady, two dimwitted henchmen who provide plenty of muscle. Luckily, the turtles have their own allies in April O'Neil, Vernon Fenwick and Casey Jones, a hockey-masked vigilante. As the pizza-loving heroes prepare for battle, the notorious Krang also emerges to pose an even greater threat.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Four unlikely warriors rise from the sewers and join forces with fearless reporter April O'Neil to save New York from Shredder and his evil minions.

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: A 450lb scientist falls for his new colleague, but out on a date, he's humiliated by a nightclub comedian about his weight. Upset and depressed, he takes a potion he's only tested previously on hamsters. He ends up turning into a svelte and cool-talking babe-magnet.

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: A guy is getting married, but his alter-ego keeps breaking through. Determined to rid himself of his pesky partner, he extracts his alter-ego's genes, but an accident and a dog hair see the later-ego take on his own life. Unaware of his existence, the man and his wife perfect their new rejuvenation formula and their fortune seems assured until his alter-ego steals it.

programme.title: Look Who's Talking Now
programme.desc: In the third of the `Look Who's Talking' comedies, two dogs enter the Umbriacco household - and take an immediate dislike to each other. When Molly loses her job, husband James is forced to take on a demanding role as private airline pilot. The children miss him, so he buys a dog to cheer them up. However, when James's glamorous boss asks his family to look after her poodle, sparks fly between the dogs.

programme.title: Big Fat Liar
programme.desc: Fibs, pranks and manoeuvres take centre stage amid a 14-year-old habitual liar's bizarre confrontation with an obnoxious filmmaker who is in dire need of a blockbuster.

programme.title: Pups United
programme.desc: A ragtag team of international talking dog mascots must leap to the rescue of their teams and thwart the plans of some villains trying to sabotage the Youth World Cup football finals.

programme.title: The Wiz
programme.desc: In this version of the classic story - based on the smash Broadway musical - Dorothy is a shy 24-year-old Harlem kindergarten teacher who is brought by a snowstorm to the mysterious Land of Oz, a sprawling, decaying, nightmarish, and dangerous megalopolis that resembles the physical characteristics of New York City.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Out of the Shadows
programme.desc: The turtles face a new challenge when Shredder escapes from custody and joins forces with Baxter Stockman, a mad scientist who plans to use a serum to take over the world. Along for the ride are Bebop and Rocksteady, two dimwitted henchmen who provide plenty of muscle. Luckily, the turtles have their own allies in April O'Neil, Vernon Fenwick and Casey Jones, a hockey-masked vigilante. As the pizza-loving heroes prepare for battle, the notorious Krang also emerges to pose an even greater threat.

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: A guy is getting married, but his alter-ego keeps breaking through. Determined to rid himself of his pesky partner, he extracts his alter-ego's genes, but an accident and a dog hair see the later-ego take on his own life. Unaware of his existence, the man and his wife perfect their new rejuvenation formula and their fortune seems assured until his alter-ego steals it.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Four unlikely warriors rise from the sewers and join forces with fearless reporter April O'Neil to save New York from Shredder and his evil minions.

programme.title: Look Who's Talking Now
programme.desc: In the third of the `Look Who's Talking' comedies, two dogs enter the Umbriacco household - and take an immediate dislike to each other. When Molly loses her job, husband James is forced to take on a demanding role as private airline pilot. The children miss him, so he buys a dog to cheer them up. However, when James's glamorous boss asks his family to look after her poodle, sparks fly between the dogs.

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: A 450lb scientist falls for his new colleague, but out on a date, he's humiliated by a nightclub comedian about his weight. Upset and depressed, he takes a potion he's only tested previously on hamsters. He ends up turning into a svelte and cool-talking babe-magnet.

programme.title: Pups United
programme.desc: A ragtag team of international talking dog mascots must leap to the rescue of their teams and thwart the plans of some villains trying to sabotage the Youth World Cup football finals.

programme.title: Hook
programme.desc: Grown-up Peter Pan has to return to Neverland to rediscover his true identity in order to rescue his children from the clutches of the evil Captain Hook. Peter has grown up into a workaholic executive but takes time off for a holiday in London. Once there, his children are kidnapped by Hook, and Peter must throw off his corporate image and go back to Neverland to save his children.

programme.title: Zathura: A Space Adventure
programme.desc: Family adventure about two squabbling siblings who find a mysterious old board game in their basement. The bickering brothers discover the game has magical powers when a chance roll of the dice sends their house into deep space, where they must battle with aliens and work together to stay alive.

programme.title: The Huntsman: Winter's War
programme.desc: Betrayed by her evil sister Ravenna, heartbroken Freya retreats to a northern kingdom to raise an army of huntsmen as her protectors. Gifted with the ability to freeze her enemies in ice, Freya teaches her young soldiers to never fall in love. When Eric and fellow warrior Sara defy this rule, the angry queen does whatever she can to stop them. As war between the siblings escalates, Eric and Sara try to end Ravenna's wicked reign.

programme.title: The Wiz
programme.desc: In this version of the classic story - based on the smash Broadway musical - Dorothy is a shy 24-year-old Harlem kindergarten teacher who is brought by a snowstorm to the mysterious Land of Oz, a sprawling, decaying, nightmarish, and dangerous megalopolis that resembles the physical characteristics of New York City.

programme.title: Ella Enchanted
programme.desc: As a child, Ella is put under a spell which makes her constantly obedient. When her evil stepsister starts using the spell against her, Ella must rid herself of the curse if she is to marry the handsome prince, especially as the regent, Sir Edgar, has his own plans for heir to the throne.

programme.title: Reuniting the Rubins
programme.desc: Uptight lawyer Lenny Rubins has to put his dream retirement on hold when he is emotionally blackmailed into reuniting his estranged children.

programme.title: The Three Musketeers: Milady
programme.desc: Constance Bonacieux is kidnapped before D'Artagnan's very eyes. In a frantic quest to save her, the young musketeer, aided by Athos, Porthos and Aramis, is forced to join forces with the mysterious Milady de Winter.

programme.title: Zathura: A Space Adventure
programme.desc: Family adventure about two squabbling siblings who find a mysterious old board game in their basement. The bickering brothers discover the game has magical powers when a chance roll of the dice sends their house into deep space, where they must battle with aliens and work together to stay alive.

When Eric and fellow warrior Sara defy this rule, the angry queen does whatever she can to stop them. As war between the siblings escalates, Eric and Sara try to end Ravenna's wicked reign.

programme.title: Ella Enchanted
programme.desc: As a child, Ella is put under a spell which makes her constantly obedient. When her evil stepsister starts using the spell against her, Ella must rid herself of the curse if she is to marry the handsome prince, especially as the regent, Sir Edgar, has his own plans for heir to the throne.

programme.title: Reuniting the Rubins
programme.desc: Uptight lawyer Lenny Rubins has to put his dream retirement on hold when he is emotionally blackmailed into reuniting his estranged children.

programme.title: Yogi Bear
programme.desc: Yogi, Boo Boo and Ranger Smith team up to try to stop the mayor from closing Jellystone Park and selling it to loggers.

programme.title: Peter Rabbit
programme.desc: Peter Rabbit and his three sisters -- Flopsy, Mopsy and Cotton-Tail -- enjoy spending their days in Mr. McGregor's vegetable garden. When one of McGregor's relatives suddenly moves in, he's less than thrilled to discover a family of rabbits in his new home. A battle of wills soon breaks out as the new owner hatches scheme after scheme to get rid of Peter -- a resourceful rabbit who proves to be a worthy and wily opponent.

programme.title: Jack the Giant Slayer
programme.desc: A young farmhand gets swept into the realm of legend when he must defend his land from a seemingly unstoppable force of giant warriors.

programme.title: Snow White & the Huntsman
programme.desc: In a twist to the fairy tale, the Huntsman ordered to take Snow White into the woods to be killed winds up becoming her protector and mentor in a quest to vanquish the Evil Queen.

programme.title: Oliver!
programme.desc: Endearing film version of Lionel Bart's successful stage musical based on Dickens's tale of the fluctuating fortunes of an orphan boy. Ron Moody stands out as the wily old scrounger Fagin in a series of well-crafted set-pieces and atmospheric musical numbers, and a tribe of child stars brings the 19th-century London underworld vividly to life.

programme.title: The Spiderwick Chronicles
programme.desc: Two twin brothers, Jared and Simon, and their sister Mallory are relocated by their mother to their great-great uncle's creepy home in the middle of nowhere. Exploring, Jared finds his great-great uncle's secret study and a book, the `Field Guide to the Fantastical World around Them', which opens up a world of goblins, spirits, ogres, trolls and griffins, some of whom are friendly and helpful and others not.

programme.title: A Tiger's Journey
programme.desc: In the valleys of the Himalayas, an orphan boy saves a Bengal tiger cub from poachers who killed the animal's mother. The two head to the Taktsang monastery in Buthan, known as "The Tiger's Nest".

programme.title: Yogi Bear
programme.desc: Yogi, Boo Boo and Ranger Smith team up to try to stop the mayor from closing Jellystone Park and selling it to loggers.

programme.title: Jack the Giant Slayer
programme.desc: A young farmhand gets swept into the realm of legend when he must defend his land from a seemingly unstoppable force of giant warriors.

A battle of wills soon breaks out as the new owner hatches scheme after scheme to get rid of Peter -- a resourceful rabbit who proves to be a worthy and wily opponent.

programme.title: The Cat in the Hat
programme.desc: Housebound children are visited by a cat who saves them from their rainy-day boredom by bringing mayhem to their house while their mum is at work.

programme.title: Stardust
programme.desc: In a countryside town bordering on a magical land, a young man ventures into the realm of fairies to retrieve a fallen star in order to win the heart of his beloved.

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: Live-action version of the classic stone-age cartoon series. Fred Flintstone donates his family savings to help neighbour Barney Rubble and wife Betty adopt a child, much to the dismay of mother-in-law Pearl. To return the favour, Barney swaps slabs with Fred in an aptitude test, resulting in Fred's being promoted and becoming involved in an embezzlement plot, while Barney is left in the dole queue.

programme.title: The Flintstones in Viva Rock Vegas
programme.desc: Prehistoric prequel in which working-class college friends decide to set off for a fun weekend in Rock Vegas with their two new girlfriends. One of them has a rival for the affections of his girlfriend as she is hit on by a wealthy playboy.

programme.title: The Huntsman: Winter's War
programme.desc: Betrayed by her evil sister Ravenna, heartbroken Freya retreats to a northern kingdom to raise an army of huntsmen as her protectors. Gifted with the ability to freeze her enemies in ice, Freya teaches her young soldiers to never fall in love. When Eric and fellow warrior Sara defy this rule, the angry queen does whatever she can to stop them. As war between the siblings escalates, Eric and Sara try to end Ravenna's wicked reign.

programme.title: Paulie
programme.desc: A wisecracking parrot caged in a research lab tells his life story to a lonely janitor. Before coming to the science lab, he has passed through the hands of a succession of owners, from a petty criminal to a man who runs a parrot-dancing act. Touched by his colourful story, the janitor conspires to liberate the talking bird.

programme.title: It Takes Two
programme.desc: When a foster child meets the daughter of a bazillionaire, they hatch a plan to solve the problems in their life, and switch identities.

programme.title: My Penguin Friend
programme.desc: A heartbroken fisherman finds a penguin drifting alone in the ocean, drenched in oil from a spill. He not only rescues the sea creature, but takes it under his wing, finding a sense of joy for the first time in years.

programme.title: The Cat in the Hat
programme.desc: Housebound children are visited by a cat who saves them from their rainy-day boredom by bringing mayhem to their house while their mum is at work.

programme.title: The Flintstones in Viva Rock Vegas
programme.desc: Prehistoric prequel in which working-class college friends decide to set off for a fun weekend in Rock Vegas with their two new girlfriends. One of them has a rival for the affections of his girlfriend as she is hit on by a wealthy playboy.

programme.title: Men in Black 3
programme.desc: Agent J goes back to the swinging 60s in a time-travelling mission to save his partner from a murderous alien.

programme.title: Men in Black
programme.desc: Working for a highly funded yet unofficial government agency, Kay and Jay are the Men in Black, providers of immigration services and regulators of all things alien on Earth. While investigating a series of unregistered close encounters, the MIB agents uncover the deadly plot of an intergalactic terrorist who is on a mission to assassinate two ambassadors from opposing galaxies currently in residence in New York City.

programme.title: Men in Black II
programme.desc: Sequel to the sci-fi comedy about a top-secret government task force set up to deal with unruly extraterrestrials. An MIB agent turns to the only man who can help him save the world from a rampaging, shape-shifting alien which has taken on the outward appearance of a sexy lingerie model.

programme.title: Men in Black 3
programme.desc: Agent J goes back to the swinging 60s in a time-travelling mission to save his partner from a murderous alien.

programme.title: Brewster's Millions
programme.desc: After losing his position as a minor-league pitcher, Montgomery Brewster learns his great-uncle has left him 300 million dollars. To inherit it, Brewster must spend 30 million in 30 days under a complicated set of rules that forbid him from donating too much to charity or retaining any new assets when the period is up. Unable to share details about the will's odd conditions with anyone, Brewster sets out to spend his money under the stern eye of paralegal Angela Drake.

programme.title: Dad's Army
programme.desc: In 1940, with a German invasion looming, the defence of Walmington-on-Sea is in the hands of local bank manager Captain Mainwaring and a motley collection of volunteers. After a series of blunders, the Home Guard finally get the glory they deserve.

programme.title: Parenthood
programme.desc: An over-protective dad, determined to do a better job than his own distant father, anxiously dotes on his troubled eight-year-old son. His brother, meanwhile, strives to mould his toddler daughter into an academic high-flyer, and his sister struggles with two rebellious, angst-ridden teenagers.

programme.title: Housesitter
programme.desc: Newton Davis builds a dream home for his childhood sweetheart and is promptly dumped. Devastated, he seeks solace in the arms of a waitress, but sneaks off into the night once he's had his fun. The spurned waitress exacts her revenge by moving into the empty house and masquerading as Newton's wife. At this stage, things start getting complicated.

programme.title: Twins
programme.desc: Two very different twin brothers were born as a result of a genetic experiment. Following their birth, the flawless Julius grew up on a paradise island, while the less-than-perfect Vincent was sent to an orphanage. Now, many years later, Vincent is a thief and con man with huge debts. What will Julius think when he searches for his long-lost twin and finds him in jail?

programme.title: Brewster's Millions
programme.desc: After losing his position as a minor-league pitcher, Montgomery Brewster learns his great-uncle has left him 300 million dollars. To inherit it, Brewster must spend 30 million in 30 days under a complicated set of rules that forbid him from donating too much to charity or retaining any new assets when the period is up. Unable to share details about the will's odd conditions with anyone, Brewster sets out to spend his money under the stern eye of paralegal Angela Drake.

programme.title: Parenthood
programme.desc: An over-protective dad, determined to do a better job than his own distant father, anxiously dotes on his troubled eight-year-old son. His brother, meanwhile, strives to mould his toddler daughter into an academic high-flyer, and his sister struggles with two rebellious, angst-ridden teenagers.

programme.title: The Blues Brothers
programme.desc: After his release from prison, Jake reunites with his brother, Elwood -- collectively known as the `Blues Brothers'. Jake's first task is to save the orphanage the brothers grew up in from closing, by raising 5000 dollars to pay back taxes. The two are convinced they can earn the money by getting their old band back together. However, after playing several gigs and making a few enemies, including the police, the brothers face daunting odds to deliver the money on time.

programme.title: See No Evil, Hear No Evil
programme.desc: Lighthearted adventures of a pair of news vendors in New York - one deaf, one blind - who go on the run when they are blamed for the murder of a customer. Each has seen - or heard - just a whiff of a clue, and a frantic chase ensues as the duo struggle to clear their names.

programme.title: Sixteen Candles
programme.desc: A teen suffers the pain of adolescence as she longs for Mr Right while fending off the advances of the class clown.

programme.title: Midnight Run
programme.desc: A gruff cop turned bounty hunter captures a fugitive accountant accused of fraud and sets off from New York for Los Angeles to collect his prize. However, he is unaware that both the Mafia and the FBI are also on the accountant's trail and hot on their heels.

programme.title: True Grit
programme.desc: A teenage girl wants revenge on the man who killed her father, but she needs help from legendary one-eyed marshal `Rooster' Cogburn, and a Texas Ranger.

programme.title: Small Soldiers
programme.desc: A toy company develops action-figure soldiers whose realistic fighting capabilities cause mayhem for a toy-shop owner and his family. Unaware of their military prowess, the shop keeper takes delivery of the soldiers, who break free from their packaging to attack their Gorgonite enemies. When the Gorgonites communicate with the shop keeper's son, the humans find themselves under siege.

programme.title: Galaxy Quest
programme.desc: The stars of a 1970s sci-fi show - now scraping a living through re-runs and sci-fi conventions - are beamed aboard an alien spacecraft. Believing the cast's heroic on-screen dramas are historical documents of real-life adventures, the band of aliens turn to the ailing celebrities for help in their quest to overcome the oppressive regime in their solar system.

programme.title: Housesitter
programme.desc: Newton Davis builds a dream home for his childhood sweetheart and is promptly dumped. Devastated, he seeks solace in the arms of a waitress, but sneaks off into the night once he's had his fun. The spurned waitress exacts her revenge by moving into the empty house and masquerading as Newton's wife. At this stage, things start getting complicated.

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: A 450lb scientist falls for his new colleague, but out on a date, he's humiliated by a nightclub comedian about his weight. Upset and depressed, he takes a potion he's only tested previously on hamsters. He ends up turning into a svelte and cool-talking babe-magnet.

programme.title: The Golden Child
programme.desc: A social worker who specialises in missing children is recruited to rescue a mystical Tibetan child from evil forces.

programme.title: Alfie
programme.desc: In 1960s London, an aimless, amoral young man exploits the women with whom he becomes intimately involved, until something happens to make him reconsider his existence.

programme.title: Scent of a Woman
programme.desc: Frank is a retired Lt Col in the US army. He's blind and impossible to get along with. Charlie is at school and is looking forward to going to university. Yo help pay for a trip home for Christmas, he agrees to look after Frank over Thanksgiving. Frank's niece says this will be easy money, but she didn't foresee Frank spending his Thanksgiving in New York.

programme.title: The Fisher King
programme.desc: When a DJ's sardonic exhortation to a late-night caller to wipe out a bar full of yuppies is taken literally, his world falls apart. Years later, on the point of suicide, he is saved by a similar casualty, a former medievalist whose wife was a victim of the bar bloodbath, and offered a chance for redemption by the man's quest for the Holy Grail.

programme.title: Bad Boys
programme.desc: Two wisecracking Miami cops are forced to swap identities in order to track down $100 million worth of heroin stolen from the police. Their only lead is a young woman who can identify the culprits, but when they track her down, she mistakes one of the cops for his partner, forcing the pair into a bizarre and chaotic life swap.

programme.title: Shane
programme.desc: A former gunslinger must strap on his six-shooter once again to defend homesteaders from a greedy cattle baron.

programme.title: Billy Madison
programme.desc: Billy is the son of hotel chain magnate Brian Madison and expects to inherit the family fortune, but he's shocked when his father stipulates he won't unless he passes 12th grade in just 24 weeks. It will be tough, since he never passed 1st grade. Determined to prove his father wrong, Billy enrols at school.

programme.title: The Cinema List: British Sky Originals
programme.desc: With a little something for everyone, discover a selection of British Sky Originals that includes 'Four Kids' and 'It' to 'SAS Red Notice'.

programme.title: Twins
programme.desc: Two very different twin brothers were born as a result of a genetic experiment. Following their birth, the flawless Julius grew up on a paradise island, while the less-than-perfect Vincent was sent to an orphanage. Now, many years later, Vincent is a thief and con man with huge debts. What will Julius think when he searches for his long-lost twin and finds him in jail?

programme.title: Gorillas in the Mist
programme.desc: Biopic nominated for five Oscars. The story of Dian Fossey, the conservationist who battled poachers and red tape for 20 years to save a species, including her relationship with photographer Bob Campbell and her tragic murder.

programme.title: The Godfather
programme.desc: The violent story of a Mafia family fighting to establish supremacy in the American business world following World War II, where an assassination attempt leaves Vito Corleone too ill to run the family business.

programme.title: The Godfather, Part II
programme.desc: Vito struggles to make a living, legally or illegally, for his wife and family in 1910s Little Italy, while Michael Corleone's 1950s business expansion and lust for power leads to paranoia and the destruction of his family.

programme.title: The Godfather, Part III
programme.desc: Ex-don, Michael Corleone, tries to legitimise his family's interests while at the same time keeping his daughter out of the family's seamier dealings. His descent accelerates as the Vatican becomes involved and events from the past conspire to keep him involved in a world he is trying to forget.

programme.title: Bad Boys
programme.desc: Two wisecracking Miami cops are forced to swap identities in order to track down $100 million worth of heroin stolen from the police. Their only lead is a young woman who can identify the culprits, but when they track her down, she mistakes one of the cops for his partner, forcing the pair into a bizarre and chaotic life swap.

programme.title: Grease
programme.desc: High-spirited musical set in 1950s America, in which a girl and boy who met on the beach are unexpectedly reunited at high school. She cannot understand how different he has become. Can the leather-clad, tough-talking leader of the T-Birds really be the same person? Perhaps her new friends, the Pink Ladies, can help her win back his heart?

programme.title: A League of Their Own
programme.desc: Based on a true story, this film, set during World War II, tells the story of the all-female baseball league that was started while the American men were away fighting in Europe. After a team of potential players has been recruited, former player Jimmy Dugan coaches the girls and prepares them for the World Series.

programme.title: Midnight Express
programme.desc: Based on the true story of an American who endured the horrors of a Turkish prison after his arrest on drug charges.

programme.title: Enter the Dragon
programme.desc: A kung fu expert is assigned to penetrate an island fortress to destroy an opium and white slavery empire.

programme.title: Congo
programme.desc: Scientist Karen Ross is sent by her father-in-law, mogul RB Travis, to the Congo to determine the whereabouts of his son's missing diamond-hunting team. Led by expert guide Kelly, Ross and a mismatched search party including scientist Dr Peter Elliot, treasure hunter Herkermer Homolka and a gorilla, discover a danger far more sinister than anything they expected to find, even in the heart of the jungle.

programme.title: See No Evil, Hear No Evil
programme.desc: Lighthearted adventures of a pair of news vendors in New York - one deaf, one blind - who go on the run when they are blamed for the murder of a customer. Each has seen - or heard - just a whiff of a clue, and a frantic chase ensues as the duo struggle to clear their names.

programme.title: The Golden Child
programme.desc: A social worker who specialises in missing children is recruited to rescue a mystical Tibetan child from evil forces.

programme.title: Wolf Man
programme.desc: Attacked by an unseen animal, Blake and his family barricade themselves inside a farmhouse as the creature prowls the perimeter. As the night stretches on, however, he begins to behave strangely, transforming into something unrecognizable.

programme.title: Novocaine
programme.desc: When the girl of his dreams gets kidnapped, a man turns his inability to feel pain into an unexpected advantage as he fights a bunch of thugs to get her back.

programme.title: Bridget Jones: Mad About the Boy
programme.desc: After jumping back into the dating pool, single mother Bridget Jones finds herself caught between a younger man and her son's science teacher.

programme.title: Code 3
programme.desc: On his final 24-hour shift, a burned-out paramedic is tasked with training his eager but inexperienced replacement. What starts as a routine night quickly spirals into a chaotic odyssey that tests their endurance, instincts and sense of humour.

programme.title: Nosferatu
programme.desc: A new bride is left under the care of friends when her husband travels to Transylvania for a meeting with Count Orlok. Plagued by horrific visions and an increasing sense of dread, she soon encounters an evil force that's far beyond her control.

programme.title: Spin the Bottle
programme.desc: When a group of friends play spin the bottle in a house marked by a brutal massacre, they unknowingly unleash an evil spirit and start dying in terrifying ways. The survivors must stick together to uncover the house's secrets and end the bloodshed.

programme.title: Die Alone
programme.desc: A young man with amnesia bands together with a rugged survivalist after a devastating virus causes a zombie-like outbreak.

programme.title: Wish You Were Here
programme.desc: When a perfect night with a perfect stranger ends suddenly the next morning, Charlotte searches for answers and meaning in her life. However, she soon uncovers a shocking secret that changes everything she knows about the man who captured her heart.
